programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 0286486, Title: The Shield, --- Description: The Shield: Created by Shawn Ryan. With Michael Chiklis, Michael Jace, Jay Karnes, CCH Pounder. Follows the lives and cases of a dirty Los Angeles Police Department cop and the unit under his command." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0286486/","name":"The Shield","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTcwNzQwODI5NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNzQxMjI5MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Follows the lives and cases of a dirty Los Angeles Police Department cop and the unit under his command.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0286486/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"danielcereto","dateCreated":"2020-07-31","inLanguage":"English","name":"The Shield on 2020","reviewBody":"I just finished this series today on July 2020 and all I have to say is that it does not look cheap, old or non interesting, just keeping in mind this was filmed between 2002-2008. First, most of the main cast are extremely good actors. Vic, Aceveda and Shane were the most powerful. Second, the storyline and the length of the chapters are quite good too. Probably the story could have been told with 4-5 seasons easily. But it is what it is. Last, camera work, make up and sound are pretty cool. I can't believe this show started on 2002. On the other hand, seems some characters were not fully developed or look like the writers didn't want to give them credit. But not a big thing. So, overall if you're looking for an excellent cops show, brutal, raw and almost perfect, this one is for you. Now, I'm going to watch The Wire. I want to compare both shows and see which one is better.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":77198,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.7,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Crime","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2002-03-12","keywords":"corrupt cop,los angeles california,made for cable tv,mayor,drugs","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004821/","name":"Michael Chiklis","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0413052/","name":"Michael Jace","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0439813/","name":"Jay Karnes"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0086397/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0203234/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0056447/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0752841/","name":"Shawn Ryan"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Shield: Season Seven","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi425591577","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI1NjYxNjgtYmIzYy00ZmUzLTllNjMtMzA3MDMwMDAxZmQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI1NjYxNjgtYmIzYy00ZmUzLTllNjMtMzA3MDMwMDAxZmQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home video trailer for the final season of this cop show"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: This Is the End
Sztuka kradzieży
The Art of the Steal
programme.desc:
This Is the End: Directed by Evan Goldberg, Seth Rogen. With James Franco, Jonah Hill, Seth Rogen, Jay Baruchel. Six Los Angeles celebrities are stuck in James Franco's house after a series of devastating events just destroyed the city. Inside, the group not only have to face the apocalypse, but themselves." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1245492/","name":"This Is the End","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQxODE3NjM1Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzkzNjc4OA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Six Los Angeles celebrities are stuck in James Franco's house after a series of devastating events just destroyed the city. Inside, the group not only have to face the apocalypse, but themselves.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1245492/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Ric-7"},"dateCreated":"2013-06-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"A devil put aside for me","reviewBody":"I thoroughly enjoyed the film, though in retrospect, I am not sure if it is really a great film--there's not much to compare it to. One thing's for certain: this film is not "just like" any other film you could name. It is one of the funniest films I have seen in quite a while. And I am probably going to miss the Rapture as a result of my enjoyment.

The film has graphic sex talk and graphic violence. The dialog could hardly be any nastier. And of course, hardly more sacrilegious. However, despite all of that, the film is surprisingly good-natured.

This is not a film for children or for family viewing. Anyone who is squeamish or easily offended should stay away.

And don't automatically assume that anyone over 40 would not like this film. I'm over 60; I had a great time. So I saw it a second time, and loved it even more.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":399178,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy"],"datePublished":"2013-09-11","keywords":"apocalypse,ensemble cast,actress playing herself,actor playing himself,male friendship","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Green Band Version","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi166438425","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQxNjI0ODE3NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzExMjkyMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQxNjI0ODE3NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzExMjkyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Six friends become trapped in a house after a series of strange and catastrophic events devastate Los Angeles. As the world unravels outside, dwindling supplies and cabin fever threaten to tear apart the friendships inside. Eventually, they are forced to leave the house, facing their fate and the true meaning of friendship and redemption. "},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0290556/","name":"James Franco"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1706767/","name":"Jonah Hill"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0736622/","name":"Seth Rogen"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1698571/","name":"Evan Goldberg"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0736622/","name":"Seth Rogen"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0345956/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0142446/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0736622/","name":"Seth Rogen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1698571/","name":"Evan Goldberg"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1083540/","name":"Jason Stone"}],"duration":"PT1H47M"}</script><metacontent="

Defendor
programme.desc: Defendor: Directed by Peter Stebbings. With Woody Harrelson, Elias Koteas, Michael Kelly, Sandra Oh. Arthur Poppington, a regular man who adopts a superhero persona, known as "Defendor", combs the city streets at night, in search of his archenemy, Captain Industry." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1303828/","name":"Defendor","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzM4MjI5MzcwNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDEzMjkxMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Arthur Poppington, a regular man who adopts a superhero persona, known as "Defendor", combs the city streets at night, in search of his archenemy, Captain Industry.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1303828/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"sergelamarche"},"dateCreated":"2018-05-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great film!","reviewBody":"The story really works and the actors are doing it justice. programme.desc:
Ghostbusters: Directed by Ivan Reitman. With Bill Murray, Dan Aykroyd, Sigourney Weaver, Harold Ramis. Three parapsychologists forced out of their university funding set up shop as a unique ghost removal service in New York City, attracting frightened yet skeptical customers." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0087332/","name":"Ghostbusters","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkxMjYyNzgwMl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTE3MjYyMTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Three parapsychologists forced out of their university funding set up shop as a unique ghost removal service in New York City, attracting frightened yet skeptical customers.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0087332/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"magic_marker"},"dateCreated":"2002-09-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"A severely underrated film","reviewBody":"What's that you say? Ghostbusters, one of the most financially successful and over-hyped comedies of the eighties, underrated? Yes. Precicely because it was so over-hyped and made so much money, there has been a stigma attached to this film identifying it as a childish FX piece, when it is nothing of the sort. Most of the lines people remember("He slimed me," "OK. So? She's a dog," "When someone asks you if you're a god, you say YES!") are not its funniest or wittiest lines, which often are missed on first or even second viewing. I laugh every time I observe a gag or a quip that I somehow missed the other 20 times I viewed a scene; "Egon, this reminds me of the time you tried to drill a hole through your head, remember that?" "That would have worked if you hadn't stopped me", or, to the driver of a van from a loony bin, "Dropping off or picking up?" Brilliant.

Not only is Ghostbusters funny, it manages to include some truly scary scenes. And not just lose-your-popcorn moments like the fridge from Hell, but also scenes of quiet, thoughtful chill, like Egon's retelling of how the possessed apartment building came into being, or Winston recalling the Book of Revelation. Which other film has managed to combine the Marx Brothers with HP Lovecraft?

The special effects hold up well, besides some obvious studio sets and models, but what really creates this film's world is the stunning cinematography. Manhattan, perhaps the pinnacle of Gothic architectural evolution, is brilliantly utilised here to create a sense of menacing grandeur. After watching "Ghostbusters" I couldn't imagine the realm of the Old Gods opening into our world from anywhere else. The soundtrack is great, not the overrated theme (Which was in fact lifted from Huey Lewis' "I Need a New Drug"), but the wonderfully blusey "Cleaning Up the Town," the creepy proto-techno chiller "Magic" and also the wonderful score by the late and much lamented Elmer Bernstein.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":388492,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Action","Comedy","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"1984-06-08","keywords":"ghost,ghostbuster,scientist,paranormal investigation team,supernatural being","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"30th Anniversary Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2800593945","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTgxNTM3MDUxNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDgwMDgxMjE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTgxNTM3MDUxNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDgwMDgxMjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Watch the 30th Anniversary Trailer for Ghostbusters."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000195/","name":"Bill Murray"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000101/","name":"Dan Aykroyd"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000244/","name":"Sigourney Weaver"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0718645/","name":"Ivan Reitman"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0147858/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0012330/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000101/","name":"Dan Aykroyd"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000601/","name":"Harold Ramis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001548/","name":"Rick Moranis"}],"duration":"PT1H45M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Ghostbusters II
Pogromcy duchów II
Ghostbusters II
programme.desc:
Ghostbusters II: Directed by Ivan Reitman. With Bill Murray, Dan Aykroyd, Sigourney Weaver, Harold Ramis. The discovery of a massive river of ectoplasm and a resurgence of spectral activity allows the staff of Ghostbusters to revive the business." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0097428/","name":"Ghostbusters II","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ2NTk4MjE5Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODIwNjYxMTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"The discovery of a massive river of ectoplasm and a resurgence of spectral activity allows the staff of Ghostbusters to revive the business.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0097428/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ccthemovieman-1"},"dateCreated":"2006-03-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"No, It's Not The Original, But It's Still Very Funny","reviewBody":"This was another sequel that was fashionable to knock when it came out. It got panned because it couldn't live up to the first Ghostbusters. Well, what could? The first one was so original, so enormously popular than any sequel was bound to fail as far as matching it.

This second Ghostbusters was just fine, very entertaining and it was nice to see all the main characters back. It had a little nicer feel to it and was more family-friendly language-wise, so it even had some things going for it the first one didn't have.

The other major different in this sequel was watching Peter MacNichol, who reprized his "Renfield"-type character from Mel Brooks' "Dead: And Loving It" comedy with Leslie Nielsen. Here, MacNichol plays "Janosz Poha," another wacko with a thick Eastern European accent. He is hilarious, and elevates the enjoyment of this film. Otherwise, the rest of the cast plays and acts just as they did in the first film, which means you'll get a lot of laughs out of them The story just isn't as intense, that's all. No, it can't equal the original, but.....

The bottom line is this: Don't try to compare the two films. If you enjoyed the first, you'll like this.....period.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":196550,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Action","Comedy","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"1989-06-16","keywords":"ghost,new york city,ghostbuster,baby,slime","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Ghostbusters II","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2401943065","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWUxOTJiOWEtZDY3Yi00MTMzLTk2NWItOWUxNGU4MzJmNWQ4XkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWUxOTJiOWEtZDY3Yi00MTMzLTk2NWItOWUxNGU4MzJmNWQ4XkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Official Trailer 2"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000195/","name":"Bill Murray"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000101/","name":"Dan Aykroyd"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000244/","name":"Sigourney Weaver"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0718645/","name":"Ivan Reitman"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000101/","name":"Dan Aykroyd"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000601/","name":"Harold Ramis"}],"duration":"PT1H48M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 0097428, Title: Ghostbusters II, --- Description: Ghostbusters II: Directed by Ivan Reitman. With Bill Murray, Dan Aykroyd, Sigourney Weaver, Harold Ramis. The discovery of a massive river of ectoplasm and a resurgence of spectral activity allows the staff of Ghostbusters to revive the business." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0097428/","name":"Ghostbusters II","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ2NTk4MjE5Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODIwNjYxMTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"The discovery of a massive river of ectoplasm and a resurgence of spectral activity allows the staff of Ghostbusters to revive the business.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0097428/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"ccthemovieman-1","dateCreated":"2006-03-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"No, It's Not The Original, But It's Still Very Funny","reviewBody":"This was another sequel that was fashionable to knock when it came out. It got panned because it couldn't live up to the first Ghostbusters. Well, what could? The first one was so original, so enormously popular than any sequel was bound to fail as far as matching it.

This second Ghostbusters was just fine, very entertaining and it was nice to see all the main characters back. It had a little nicer feel to it and was more family-friendly language-wise, so it even had some things going for it the first one didn't have.

The other major different in this sequel was watching Peter MacNichol, who reprized his "Renfield"-type character from Mel Brooks' "Dead: And Loving It" comedy with Leslie Nielsen. Here, MacNichol plays "Janosz Poha," another wacko with a thick Eastern European accent. He is hilarious, and elevates the enjoyment of this film. Otherwise, the rest of the cast plays and acts just as they did in the first film, which means you'll get a lot of laughs out of them The story just isn't as intense, that's all. No, it can't equal the original, but.....

The bottom line is this: Don't try to compare the two films. If you enjoyed the first, you'll like this.....period.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":196550,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6,"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Action","Comedy","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"1989-06-16","keywords":"ghost,new york city,ghostbuster,baby,slime","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Ghostbusters II","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2401943065","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWUxOTJiOWEtZDY3Yi00MTMzLTk2NWItOWUxNGU4MzJmNWQ4XkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWUxOTJiOWEtZDY3Yi00MTMzLTk2NWItOWUxNGU4MzJmNWQ4XkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Official Trailer 2","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000195/","name":"Bill Murray","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000101/","name":"Dan Aykroyd","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000244/","name":"Sigourney Weaver"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0718645/","name":"Ivan Reitman"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000101/","name":"Dan Aykroyd","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000601/","name":"Harold Ramis"],"duration":"PT1H48M"</script><metacontent="

programme.desc:
Dope: Directed by Rick Famuyiwa. With ASAP Rocky, Blake Anderson, Bruce Beatty, De'aundre Bonds. Life changes for Malcolm, a geek who's surviving life in a tough neighborhood, after a chance invitation to an underground party leads him and his friends into a Los Angeles adventure." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3850214/","name":"Dope","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA3MjYyNTk0Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODc1NzQ1NTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Life changes for Malcolm, a geek who's surviving life in a tough neighborhood, after a chance invitation to an underground party leads him and his friends into a Los Angeles adventure.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3850214/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ThomasDrufke"},"dateCreated":"2015-10-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Can You Dig It?","reviewBody":"Coming out around the same time as Straight Outta Compton, which also deals with a group of friends in crime filled Cali that has a ton of music, Dope was a bit overshadowed in early August when it hit theaters. Make no mistake though, this is a really good film. It's highly entertaining, fast paced, and easily one of the most original screenplays of 2015 and perhaps of the past few years.

We follow a group of 'nerds' as they call themselves who are highly intelligent but also love 90's rap and jamming out themselves as their own band Awreeoh. It just so happens that they get caught up in a dangerously tricky situation involving some 'dope'. It's fair to say that most of what happens in the film is a bit too coincidental, it is. But what I loved most was this group of nerds and their reactions to each coinciding event. Shameik Moore plays the lead character, Malcom, and he does so wonderfully. If Moore plays his cards correctly, I think we will hear about this kid for years to come. 

More importantly, you really buy into the groups dynamic. It never feels fake even when the situation surrounding them gets to be far- fetched. But I guess that also brings me to one of my negatives which is that after the first half or so it turns into Malcom's story. The first 45 minutes are great mainly because of the group's various endeavors. It's not a bad thing necessarily, it was just a tad less interesting. There's also a message behind the film that arises around the last 15 minutes or so and I can definitely see where it would be jarring to people. It doesn't take you out of the film per se but it is something you just have to accept.

So Dope's first half is up in there in my most entertaining 45 minutes of 2015. The last hour is fine but it definitely brings the film down a notch. If anything, Dope is worth watching if you're a fan of rap, a nerd, or you would like to see one of the best performances from someone who likely won't even be considered for an Oscar. Or maybe you just want to check in and see how you're favorite rappers Tyga and ASAP Rocky did on the big screen. Either way, check out Dope.

+Moore's breakthrough role

+Music

+Original idea turns out to be so fun

+Nerds seem like actual nerds

-Second half takes a big dip in quality

His dream is to attend Harvard. A chance invitation to a big underground party leads Malcolm and his friends into a, only in Los Angeles, gritty adventure filed with offbeat characters and bad choices. If Malcolm can persevere, he'll go from being a geek, to being dope, to ultimately being himself."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4271336/","name":"Shameik Moore"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1727825/","name":"Tony Revolori"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4169922/","name":"Kiersey Clemons"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0266622/","name":"Rick Famuyiwa"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0493679/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0141580/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0309638/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0266622/","name":"Rick Famuyiwa"}],"duration":"PT1H43M"}</script><metacontent="

Make no mistake though, this is a really good film. It's highly entertaining, fast paced, and easily one of the most original screenplays of 2015 and perhaps of the past few years.

We follow a group of 'nerds' as they call themselves who are highly intelligent but also love 90's rap and jamming out themselves as their own band Awreeoh. It just so happens that they get caught up in a dangerously tricky situation involving some 'dope'. It's fair to say that most of what happens in the film is a bit too coincidental, it is. But what I loved most was this group of nerds and their reactions to each coinciding event. Shameik Moore plays the lead character, Malcom, and he does so wonderfully. If Moore plays his cards correctly, I think we will hear about this kid for years to come. 

More importantly, you really buy into the groups dynamic. It never feels fake even when the situation surrounding them gets to be far- fetched. But I guess that also brings me to one of my negatives which is that after the first half or so it turns into Malcom's story. The first 45 minutes are great mainly because of the group's various endeavors. It's not a bad thing necessarily, it was just a tad less interesting. There's also a message behind the film that arises around the last 15 minutes or so and I can definitely see where it would be jarring to people. It doesn't take you out of the film per se but it is something you just have to accept.

So Dope's first half is up in there in my most entertaining 45 minutes of 2015. The last hour is fine but it definitely brings the film down a notch. If anything, Dope is worth watching if you're a fan of rap, a nerd, or you would like to see one of the best performances from someone who likely won't even be considered for an Oscar. programme.title: Dope
Dope
programme.desc:
Dope: Directed by Rick Famuyiwa. With ASAP Rocky, Blake Anderson, Bruce Beatty, De'aundre Bonds. Life changes for Malcolm, a geek who's surviving life in a tough neighborhood, after a chance invitation to an underground party leads him and his friends into a Los Angeles adventure." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3850214/","name":"Dope","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA3MjYyNTk0Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODc1NzQ1NTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Life changes for Malcolm, a geek who's surviving life in a tough neighborhood, after a chance invitation to an underground party leads him and his friends into a Los Angeles adventure.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3850214/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ThomasDrufke"},"dateCreated":"2015-10-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Can You Dig It?","reviewBody":"Coming out around the same time as Straight Outta Compton, which also deals with a group of friends in crime filled Cali that has a ton of music, Dope was a bit overshadowed in early August when it hit theaters. Make no mistake though, this is a really good film. It's highly entertaining, fast paced, and easily one of the most original screenplays of 2015 and perhaps of the past few years.

We follow a group of 'nerds' as they call themselves who are highly intelligent but also love 90's rap and jamming out themselves as their own band Awreeoh. It just so happens that they get caught up in a dangerously tricky situation involving some 'dope'. It's fair to say that most of what happens in the film is a bit too coincidental, it is. But what I loved most was this group of nerds and their reactions to each coinciding event. Shameik Moore plays the lead character, Malcom, and he does so wonderfully. If Moore plays his cards correctly, I think we will hear about this kid for years to come. 

More importantly, you really buy into the groups dynamic. It never feels fake even when the situation surrounding them gets to be far- fetched. But I guess that also brings me to one of my negatives which is that after the first half or so it turns into Malcom's story. The first 45 minutes are great mainly because of the group's various endeavors. It's not a bad thing necessarily, it was just a tad less interesting. There's also a message behind the film that arises around the last 15 minutes or so and I can definitely see where it would be jarring to people. It doesn't take you out of the film per se but it is something you just have to accept.

So Dope's first half is up in there in my most entertaining 45 minutes of 2015. The last hour is fine but it definitely brings the film down a notch. If anything, Dope is worth watching if you're a fan of rap, a nerd, or you would like to see one of the best performances from someone who likely won't even be considered for an Oscar. Or maybe you just want to check in and see how you're favorite rappers Tyga and ASAP Rocky did on the big screen. Either way, check out Dope.

+Moore's breakthrough role

+Music

+Original idea turns out to be so fun

+Nerds seem like actual nerds

-Second half takes a big dip in quality

His dream is to attend Harvard. A chance invitation to a big underground party leads Malcolm and his friends into a, only in Los Angeles, gritty adventure filed with offbeat characters and bad choices. If Malcolm can persevere, he'll go from being a geek, to being dope, to ultimately being himself."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4271336/","name":"Shameik Moore"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1727825/","name":"Tony Revolori"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4169922/","name":"Kiersey Clemons"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0266622/","name":"Rick Famuyiwa"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0493679/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0141580/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0309638/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0266622/","name":"Rick Famuyiwa"}],"duration":"PT1H43M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Dope
Dope
programme.desc:
Dope: Directed by Rick Famuyiwa. With ASAP Rocky, Blake Anderson, Bruce Beatty, De'aundre Bonds. Life changes for Malcolm, a geek who's surviving life in a tough neighborhood, after a chance invitation to an underground party leads him and his friends into a Los Angeles adventure." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3850214/","name":"Dope","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA3MjYyNTk0Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODc1NzQ1NTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Life changes for Malcolm, a geek who's surviving life in a tough neighborhood, after a chance invitation to an underground party leads him and his friends into a Los Angeles adventure.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3850214/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ThomasDrufke"},"dateCreated":"2015-10-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Can You Dig It?","reviewBody":"Coming out around the same time as Straight Outta Compton, which also deals with a group of friends in crime filled Cali that has a ton of music, Dope was a bit overshadowed in early August when it hit theaters. Make no mistake though, this is a really good film. It's highly entertaining, fast paced, and easily one of the most original screenplays of 2015 and perhaps of the past few years.

We follow a group of 'nerds' as they call themselves who are highly intelligent but also love 90's rap and jamming out themselves as their own band Awreeoh. It just so happens that they get caught up in a dangerously tricky situation involving some 'dope'. It's fair to say that most of what happens in the film is a bit too coincidental, it is. But what I loved most was this group of nerds and their reactions to each coinciding event. Shameik Moore plays the lead character, Malcom, and he does so wonderfully. If Moore plays his cards correctly, I think we will hear about this kid for years to come. 

More importantly, you really buy into the groups dynamic. It never feels fake even when the situation surrounding them gets to be far- fetched. But I guess that also brings me to one of my negatives which is that after the first half or so it turns into Malcom's story. The first 45 minutes are great mainly because of the group's various endeavors. It's not a bad thing necessarily, it was just a tad less interesting. There's also a message behind the film that arises around the last 15 minutes or so and I can definitely see where it would be jarring to people. It doesn't take you out of the film per se but it is something you just have to accept.

So Dope's first half is up in there in my most entertaining 45 minutes of 2015. The last hour is fine but it definitely brings the film down a notch. If anything, Dope is worth watching if you're a fan of rap, a nerd, or you would like to see one of the best performances from someone who likely won't even be considered for an Oscar. Or maybe you just want to check in and see how you're favorite rappers Tyga and ASAP Rocky did on the big screen. Either way, check out Dope.

+Moore's breakthrough role

+Music

+Original idea turns out to be so fun

+Nerds seem like actual nerds

-Second half takes a big dip in quality

7.9/10","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":83370,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Adventure","Comedy","Crime"],"datePublished":"2015-06-19","keywords":"geek,african american,hip hop,tomboy,bitcoin","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"New Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi813871129","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA3OTg2NDQ3OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjI4NDQ2NTE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA3OTg2NDQ3OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjI4NDQ2NTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Malcolm is a geek, carefully surviving life in The Bottoms, a tough neighborhood in Inglewood, CA filled gangsters and drugs dealers, while juggling his senior year of college applications, interviews and the SAT. His dream is to attend Harvard. A chance invitation to a big underground party leads Malcolm and his friends into a, only in Los Angeles, gritty adventure filed with offbeat characters and bad choices. If Malcolm can persevere, he'll go from being a geek, to being dope, to ultimately being himself."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4271336/","name":"Shameik Moore"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1727825/","name":"Tony Revolori"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4169922/","name":"Kiersey Clemons"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0266622/","name":"Rick Famuyiwa"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0493679/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0141580/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0309638/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0266622/","name":"Rick Famuyiwa"}],"duration":"PT1H43M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Candice Renoir
Candice Renoir
Candice Renoir
programme.desc: Candice Renoir: Created by Robin Barataud, Brigitte Peskine, Solen Roy-Pagenault. With Cécile Bois, Raphaël Lenglet, Clara Antoons, Ali Marhyar. The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine is between solving crimes, taking out fights with her much younger female police superior officer, getting her kids to school - in addition - handling their problems too and keeping her team in line. It's a very funny and witty series with a lot of french charm and intelligent story writing. Not another dull crime series all over again. It's like a fresh french breeze on the TV screen. Candice is like a female Columbo version in high heels, handbag pink scarf and a 9mm in her holster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2819924/","name":"Candice Renoir","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM3YzUxM2UtZjIyMC00Zjg5LTk0NTMtNGQ3ZWQ0ODhlMTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc0NTExNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. IMDb data; ttnr: 2819924, Title: Candice Renoir, --- Description: Candice Renoir: Created by Robin Barataud, Brigitte Peskine, Solen Roy-Pagenault. With Cécile Bois, Raphaël Lenglet, Clara Antoons, Ali Marhyar. The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine is between solving crimes, taking out fights with her much younger female police superior officer, getting her kids to school - in addition - handling their problems too and keeping her team in line. It's a very funny and witty series with a lot of french charm and intelligent story writing. Not another dull crime series all over again. It's like a fresh french breeze on the TV screen. Candice is like a female Columbo version in high heels, handbag pink scarf and a 9mm in her holster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2819924/","name":"Candice Renoir","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM3YzUxM2UtZjIyMC00Zjg5LTk0NTMtNGQ3ZWQ0ODhlMTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc0NTExNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. programme.title: Sobel - koncert
programme.desc: Finałowy koncert trasy "Pułapka na motyle" Sobla, znanego polskiego rapera. Wydarzenie we wrocławskiej Hali Stulecia obejrzało 5 tysięcy osób. Artysta zaprezentował nowe aranżacje utworów, a jego występ uświetniły pokazy pirotechniczne oraz goście specjalni. Na scenie stawili się m.in. Young Igi, Oki, Piotrek Lewandowski (współtwórca singli "Fiołkowe pole" i "Każdego dnia") oraz Michał Szczygieł.

programme.title: Fascinatrix
programme.desc: Oskarżona o bycie wiedźmą Dorota (Joanna Drozda) ucieka przed Inkwizycją. Następnie, żądna zemsty, powraca na zamek, z którego została wygnana, w przebraniu łowcy czarownic. Krótkometrażowy musical Justyny Mytnik, nagrodzony m.in. na Świdnickim Festiwalu Filmowym "Spektrum" w 2018 roku.

programme.title: You May Kiss the Bridesmaid
Możesz pocałować druhnę
You May Kiss the Bridesmaid
programme.desc: You May Kiss the Bridesmaid: Directed by Caroline Labrèche. With Tori Anderson, Kristopher Turner, Julia Borsellino, Sarah Orenstein. Food influencer Scarlett Bailey is presented with the opportunity of a lifetime to work as a pastry chef in one of NYC's top restaurants. Her life gets put on hold when she returns to her hometown for her sister Maddie's wedding. Scarlett learns that her parents have sold the family home, a B&B, to her childhood flame Liam Perry and that Maddie has lost her wedding venue days before the nuptials. Scarlett suggests they host the event at the B&B and works with Liam to pull off the wedding of Maddie's dreams, trying to put their history behind them. As her dream job in NYC becomes a firm offer, Scarlett is forced to make a decision. She has been falling back in love with Liam and with her childhood home. With the countdown to the wedding day on, will Liam Perry get to kiss the bridesmaid?" data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt12829388/","name":"You May Kiss the Bridesmaid","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWI3MTQwNzgtYmIzNy00YWI3LWIxMGEtYmE5YmU1YmVmN2RmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTk1NzUwMA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Food influencer Scarlett Bailey is presented with the opportunity of a lifetime to work as a pastry chef in one of NYC's top restaurants. IMDb data; ttnr: 12829388, Title: You May Kiss the Bridesmaid, --- Description: You May Kiss the Bridesmaid: Directed by Caroline Labrèche. With Tori Anderson, Kristopher Turner, Julia Borsellino, Sarah Orenstein. Food influencer Scarlett Bailey is presented with the opportunity of a lifetime to work as a pastry chef in one of NYC's top restaurants. Her life gets put on hold when she returns to her hometown for her sister Maddie's wedding. Scarlett learns that her parents have sold the family home, a B&B, to her childhood flame Liam Perry and that Maddie has lost her wedding venue days before the nuptials. Scarlett suggests they host the event at the B&B and works with Liam to pull off the wedding of Maddie's dreams, trying to put their history behind them. As her dream job in NYC becomes a firm offer, Scarlett is forced to make a decision. She has been falling back in love with Liam and with her childhood home. programme.title: Diana - księżna, która przyćmiła Koronę
programme.desc: Dokument jest poświęcony życiu i spuściźnie księżnej Diany. Kobieta będąca tragiczną ikoną brytyjskiej monarchii nadal budzi ciekawość czy fascynację, mimo że od jej przedwczesnej śmieci mijają kolejne lata. Autorzy filmu starają się spojrzeć na historię swej bohaterki z nowej perspektywy, korzystając z informacji pochodzących od byłego kamerdynera, a także zaufanego biografa.

It is a multi-story romantic comedy about the people who work on weddings to create the perfect day for a loving couple - while their own relationships are outlandish, odd, crazy and far from perfect." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt10235718/","name":"Love, Weddings & Other Disasters","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODA5NzRjMDktMzc0My00NDdkLThlN2YtNDZiYjM3MGVkY2M4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTEyMjM2NDc2._V1_.jpg","description":"It is a multi-story romantic comedy about the people who work on weddings to create the perfect day for a loving couple - while their own relationships are outlandish, odd, crazy and far from perfect.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt10235718/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"vovers1"},"dateCreated":"2021-03-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"They pulled it off don't believe the trashy reviews","reviewBody":"Yes it is a cheesy, contrived, feel good wedding movie. With a couple’s impending wedding as the backdrop, Love, Weddings & Other Disasters weaves multiple storylines as it follows the search for love by a colorful group of characters including: an inexperienced wedding planner (Grace) nicknamed “The Wedding Trasher”; a fussy celebrity caterer (Irons); his blind date (Keaton); and a tour-bus guide (Andrew Bachelor) looking for his Cinderella. How their lives and loves intersect is half the fun in this film that proves romance is alive and well… and as crazy as ever!"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1192254/","name":"Maggie Grace"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000460/","name":"Jeremy Irons"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000473/","name":"Diane Keaton"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0240797/","name":"Dennis Dugan"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0754311/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0447556/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0810439/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0174885/","name":"Eileen Conn"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0240797/","name":"Dennis Dugan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0588777/","name":"Larry Miller"}],"duration":"PT1H36M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Danny Collins
Idol
Danny Collins
programme.desc: Danny Collins: Directed by Dan Fogelman. With Al Pacino, Annette Bening, Jennifer Garner, Bobby Cannavale. An aging rock star decides to change his life when he discovers a 40-year-old letter written to him by John Lennon." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1772288/","name":"Danny Collins","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDk5NTYxOTk2MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzIxMjE0MzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"An aging rock star decides to change his life when he discovers a 40-year-old letter written to him by John Lennon.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1772288/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"billcurry-1"},"dateCreated":"2015-04-15","inLanguage":"English","name":"Intellectually and Emotionally Stimulating Film","reviewBody":"Because this film is intellectually and emotionally stimulating in a subtle way, I had to drive 65 miles, from Lafayette to Baton Rouge, where it was in was in one compartment of a multiplex. That the compartment was Number Nine was a nice touch. But New Orleans had it in three theaters. My review: I enjoyed it. Been a fan of Pacino since Dog Day Afternoon, Plummer since Sound of Music, Lennon since fall, 1963. And I've never seen a movie with Annette Bening that I didn't' like. The script was good; I didn't see anything not to like. So why didn't the movie come to me rather than vice versa? Apparently, the theater owners where I live won't bet on a movie without car chases, guns, shooting, war, all sorts of violence, or juvenile, senseless humor, or mainstream sports. Perhaps a little thriller/horror/sci-fi/blockbuster (Titanic, JFK) might seep through. The sad thing is they may be right. A movie devoid of the aforementioned criteria might lose money here."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":31064,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Biography","Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2015-04-10","keywords":"boyfriend girlfriend relationship,f word,doctor,blog,reference to mike nichols and elaine may","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #1","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi343846681","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU3Njk4ODU0Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODUzMTc0MzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU3Njk4ODU0Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODUzMTc0MzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Aging 1970s rocker Danny Collins can't give up his hard-living ways, but when his manager uncovers a 40-year-old undelivered letter written to him by John Lennon, he decides to change course and embarks on a heartfelt journey to rediscover his family, find true love, and begin a second act.\r\n"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000199/","name":"Al Pacino"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000906/","name":"Annette Bening"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004950/","name":"Jennifer Garner"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1557594/","name":"Dan Fogelman"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0203259/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0485757/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1557594/","name":"Dan Fogelman"}],"duration":"PT1H46M"}</script><metacontent="

A Modern take on the classic tale of Oliver Twist." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt10077034/","name":"Twist","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTI0Mjg3MzgtNTZiZC00ZmE2LWE4YTgtMDgwYThkMWM5MzY2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A Modern take on the classic tale of Oliver Twist.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt10077034/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jonny-pears"},"dateCreated":"2021-02-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"Terrible","reviewBody":"I can honestly say this movie was hard to sit through. I started to get headaches from the running and jumping scenes that added very little to the movie. Michael Caine was also awful. It's like he took the easy money then put in no effort. Then again there wasn't much to put effort towards. I'll be honest, most of the acting here was awful from Caine to Ora to Headley. Only Noel Clarke worked. Give this a miss. programme.title: You May Kiss the Bridesmaid
Możesz pocałować druhnę
You May Kiss the Bridesmaid
programme.desc: You May Kiss the Bridesmaid: Directed by Caroline Labrèche. With Tori Anderson, Kristopher Turner, Julia Borsellino, Sarah Orenstein. Food influencer Scarlett Bailey is presented with the opportunity of a lifetime to work as a pastry chef in one of NYC's top restaurants. Her life gets put on hold when she returns to her hometown for her sister Maddie's wedding. Scarlett learns that her parents have sold the family home, a B&B, to her childhood flame Liam Perry and that Maddie has lost her wedding venue days before the nuptials. Scarlett suggests they host the event at the B&B and works with Liam to pull off the wedding of Maddie's dreams, trying to put their history behind them. As her dream job in NYC becomes a firm offer, Scarlett is forced to make a decision. She has been falling back in love with Liam and with her childhood home. With the countdown to the wedding day on, will Liam Perry get to kiss the bridesmaid?" data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt12829388/","name":"You May Kiss the Bridesmaid","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWI3MTQwNzgtYmIzNy00YWI3LWIxMGEtYmE5YmU1YmVmN2RmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTk1NzUwMA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Food influencer Scarlett Bailey is presented with the opportunity of a lifetime to work as a pastry chef in one of NYC's top restaurants. programme.title: Diana - księżna, która przyćmiła Koronę
programme.desc: Dokument jest poświęcony życiu i spuściźnie księżnej Diany. Kobieta będąca tragiczną ikoną brytyjskiej monarchii nadal budzi ciekawość czy fascynację, mimo że od jej przedwczesnej śmieci mijają kolejne lata. Autorzy filmu starają się spojrzeć na historię swej bohaterki z nowej perspektywy, korzystając z informacji pochodzących od byłego kamerdynera, a także zaufanego biografa. Dokument jest poświęcony życiu i spuściźnie księżnej Diany. Kobieta będąca tragiczną ikoną brytyjskiej monarchii nadal budzi ciekawość czy fascynację, mimo że od jej przedwczesnej śmieci mijają kolejne lata. Autorzy filmu starają się spojrzeć na historię swej bohaterki z nowej perspektywy, korzystając z informacji pochodzących od byłego kamerdynera, a także zaufanego biografa.

programme.title: Love, Weddings & Other Disasters
Miłość, ślub i inne nieszczęścia
Love, Weddings & Other Disasters
programme.desc: Love, Weddings & Other Disasters: Directed by Dennis Dugan. With Maggie Grace, Jeremy Irons, Diane Keaton, Diego Boneta. It is a multi-story romantic comedy about the people who work on weddings to create the perfect day for a loving couple - while their own relationships are outlandish, odd, crazy and far from perfect." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt10235718/","name":"Love, Weddings & Other Disasters","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODA5NzRjMDktMzc0My00NDdkLThlN2YtNDZiYjM3MGVkY2M4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTEyMjM2NDc2._V1_.jpg","description":"It is a multi-story romantic comedy about the people who work on weddings to create the perfect day for a loving couple - while their own relationships are outlandish, odd, crazy and far from perfect.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt10235718/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"vovers1"},"dateCreated":"2021-03-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"They pulled it off don't believe the trashy reviews","reviewBody":"Yes it is a cheesy, contrived, feel good wedding movie. Yet somehow the team pulls it off, don't expect anything deep or meaningful, just take it for what it is, a feel good piece of entertainment to make us happy and the production crew a salary. Probably a pretty good one.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1676,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Romance"],"datePublished":"2020-12-04","keywords":"couple","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4041982233","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjFjNTQxNGEtMjEzNS00ZjI1LTg1OTYtOTRlNmI0NzNkY2YwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjFjNTQxNGEtMjEzNS00ZjI1LTg1OTYtOTRlNmI0NzNkY2YwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Maggie Grace (Taken) and Oscar® winners Diane Keaton and Jeremy Irons lead this warmhearted romantic comedy. With a couple’s impending wedding as the backdrop, Love, Weddings & Other Disasters weaves multiple storylines as it follows the search for love by a colorful group of characters including: an inexperienced wedding planner (Grace) nicknamed “The Wedding Trasher”; a fussy celebrity caterer (Irons); his blind date (Keaton); and a tour-bus guide (Andrew Bachelor) looking for his Cinderella. How their lives and loves intersect is half the fun in this film that proves romance is alive and well… and as crazy as ever!"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1192254/","name":"Maggie Grace"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000460/","name":"Jeremy Irons"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000473/","name":"Diane Keaton"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0240797/","name":"Dennis Dugan"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0754311/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0447556/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0810439/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0174885/","name":"Eileen Conn"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0240797/","name":"Dennis Dugan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0588777/","name":"Larry Miller"}],"duration":"PT1H36M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Danny Collins
Idol
Danny Collins
programme.desc: Danny Collins: Directed by Dan Fogelman. With Al Pacino, Annette Bening, Jennifer Garner, Bobby Cannavale. An aging rock star decides to change his life when he discovers a 40-year-old letter written to him by John Lennon." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1772288/","name":"Danny Collins","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDk5NTYxOTk2MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzIxMjE0MzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"An aging rock star decides to change his life when he discovers a 40-year-old letter written to him by John Lennon.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1772288/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"billcurry-1"},"dateCreated":"2015-04-15","inLanguage":"English","name":"Intellectually and Emotionally Stimulating Film","reviewBody":"Because this film is intellectually and emotionally stimulating in a subtle way, I had to drive 65 miles, from Lafayette to Baton Rouge, where it was in was in one compartment of a multiplex. That the compartment was Number Nine was a nice touch. But New Orleans had it in three theaters. My review: I enjoyed it. Been a fan of Pacino since Dog Day Afternoon, Plummer since Sound of Music, Lennon since fall, 1963. And I've never seen a movie with Annette Bening that I didn't' like. The script was good; I didn't see anything not to like. So why didn't the movie come to me rather than vice versa? Apparently, the theater owners where I live won't bet on a movie without car chases, guns, shooting, war, all sorts of violence, or juvenile, senseless humor, or mainstream sports. Perhaps a little thriller/horror/sci-fi/blockbuster (Titanic, JFK) might seep through. The sad thing is they may be right. A movie devoid of the aforementioned criteria might lose money here."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":31064,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Biography","Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2015-04-10","keywords":"boyfriend girlfriend relationship,f word,doctor,blog,reference to mike nichols and elaine may","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #1","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi343846681","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU3Njk4ODU0Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODUzMTc0MzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU3Njk4ODU0Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODUzMTc0MzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Aging 1970s rocker Danny Collins can't give up his hard-living ways, but when his manager uncovers a 40-year-old undelivered letter written to him by John Lennon, he decides to change course and embarks on a heartfelt journey to rediscover his family, find true love, and begin a second act.\r\n"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000199/","name":"Al Pacino"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000906/","name":"Annette Bening"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004950/","name":"Jennifer Garner"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1557594/","name":"Dan Fogelman"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0203259/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0485757/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1557594/","name":"Dan Fogelman"}],"duration":"PT1H46M"}</script><metacontent="

A Modern take on the classic tale of Oliver Twist." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt10077034/","name":"Twist","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTI0Mjg3MzgtNTZiZC00ZmE2LWE4YTgtMDgwYThkMWM5MzY2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A Modern take on the classic tale of Oliver Twist.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt10077034/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jonny-pears"},"dateCreated":"2021-02-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"Terrible","reviewBody":"I can honestly say this movie was hard to sit through. I started to get headaches from the running and jumping scenes that added very little to the movie. Michael Caine was also awful. It's like he took the easy money then put in no effort. Then again there wasn't much to put effort towards. I'll be honest, most of the acting here was awful from Caine to Ora to Headley. Only Noel Clarke worked. Give this a miss. Another Sky production that fails to be worth it.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":2}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2396,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.1},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Drama"],"datePublished":"2021-01-29","keywords":"oliver twist,parkour,art gallery,art theft,graffiti","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2089992985","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDIyZDc2MmItNWY1Mi00M2IwLTk0ODMtYzNlYWFhOGZhMzBhXkEyXkFqcGdeQWxiaWFtb250._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDIyZDc2MmItNWY1Mi00M2IwLTk0ODMtYzNlYWFhOGZhMzBhXkEyXkFqcGdeQWxiaWFtb250._V1_.jpg","description":"Inspired by Charles Dickens's iconic novel OLIVER TWIST, this action-fueled crime-thriller set in contemporary London follows the journey of Twist (Raff Law), a gifted graffiti artist trying to find his way after the loss of his mother. Lured into a street gang headed by the paternal Fagin (Oscar® winner Michael Caine), Twist is attracted to the lifestyle - and to Red (Sophie Simnett), an alluring member of Fagin's crew. But when an art theft goes wrong, Twist's moral code is tested as he's caught between Fagin, the police, and a loose-cannon enforcer (Lena Headey)."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm10823838/","name":"Dominic Di Tommaso"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0372176/","name":"Lena Headey"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm10356694/","name":"Samuel Leakey"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1966532/","name":"Martin Owen"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0687593/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0193056/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0744004/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1332311/","name":"John Wrathall"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm9840145/","name":"Sally Collett"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1213712/","name":"Matthew Parkhill"}],"duration":"PT1H30M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Miedzy oczy
Między oczy
programme.desc: Miedzy oczy: Directed by Piotr Weresniak. With Tamara Arciuch, Dominika Kluzniak, Bartek Kasprzykowski, Bartosz Opania. Two married couples, friends from college, meet after fifteen years to spend the weekend together in a summer house by the water. Unexpectedly for themselves, there is more that separates them than connects them. Old friends represent different world views, social, religious and civilizational attitudes of the contemporary world. The cultural war going on in the world today has reached them as well. When it finally seems that there are opportunities for a common language beyond divisions, something happens that exacerbates the conflict even more." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt16222346/","name":"Miedzy oczy","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmNkMTZlMTUtYjFmNy00YzE5LTlhM2MtMDk0MWY5YTY3NzQyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTEwMTY3NDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Two married couples, friends from college, meet after fifteen years to spend the weekend together in a summer house by the water. programme.title: Nie ten czlowiek
Nie ten człowiek
programme.desc: Nie ten czlowiek: Directed by Pawel Wendorff. With Bartosz Turzynski, Slawomir Orzechowski, Jan Frycz, Jacek Braciak. The film is a surreal collage of interrelated threads revolving around history of thirty-year-old Kuba who, with his parents' encouragement, decides to take his first job. Though none too convinced, he starts work as a delivery man. Having set out on his first delivery soon after he witnesses a traffic accident. He ends up giving a statement at the police station. And his plans begin to unravel. By a twist of fate Kuba has no idea about the significance of the part he will have to play on this particular day." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1808335/","name":"Nie ten czlowiek","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDkzODc4ZGUtNGYzZi00YzdmLWJkMWMtZDE5YzYxNThiNDJiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTc4MzI2NQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The film is a surreal collage of interrelated threads revolving around history of thirty-year-old Kuba who, with his parents' encouragement, decides to take his first job. programme.title: One of a Kind Love
Jedyna taka miłość
One of a Kind Love
programme.desc:
One of a Kind Love: Directed by Philippe Lupien. With Jake Manley, Daniela Sandiford, Raphael Grosz-Harvey, Alain Goulem. Kyra's dreams of being a jeweler have been put on the backburner, as her demanding job at the Sawyer Country Club is her priority. When a vacant shop becomes available in town, Kyra sees an opportunity to put a plan into action, until she learns that there's another renter interested in the space. Enter Aiden Sawyer, prodigal son, big-city business magnate and Kyra's childhood nemesis, returning home to the country club his parents own. As they patch up their past, Kyra and Aiden learn that there may be something more between them than just playful flirting. But when Kyra enters a renowned jewelry contest to raise enough money to outbid the mystery renter, Aiden finds himself in a race against time to make everything right." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt13012364/","name":"One of a Kind Love","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGY4MWQwNTEtOTEzMC00NDdjLWIwMTItMzcyZDhiMWNiM2JmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTk1NzUwMA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Kyra's dreams of being a jeweler have been put on the backburner, as her demanding job at the Sawyer Country Club is her priority. When a vacant shop becomes available in town, Kyra sees an opportunity to put a plan into action, unti","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt13012364/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ssimeonidou1"},"dateCreated":"2021-04-26","inLanguage":"English","name":"Sweet movie!","reviewBody":"Everything in this film is good enough! The script has a pleasant and quick plot, the cast is good, the scenery is beautiful and the leading actors are sweet, good looking and well suited for the characters they portray! They definetely have chemistry!!!

You can understand from the first moment Kyra and Eidan will have their happy ending, with the usual misunderstanding near the end of the movie but.... has a nice twist.... instead the usual format where this keeps going on and on..... Eidan who in fact protected her dream, explains everything to her honestly and Kyra doesn't hesitate to fall in his arms in a hot kissing moment!!!

IMDb data; ttnr: 13012364, Title: One of a Kind Love, --- Description: One of a Kind Love: Directed by Philippe Lupien. With Jake Manley, Daniela Sandiford, Raphael Grosz-Harvey, Alain Goulem. Kyra's dreams of being a jeweler have been put on the backburner, as her demanding job at the Sawyer Country Club is her priority. When a vacant shop becomes available in town, Kyra sees an opportunity to put a plan into action, until she learns that there's another renter interested in the space. Enter Aiden Sawyer, prodigal son, big-city business magnate and Kyra's childhood nemesis, returning home to the country club his parents own. As they patch up their past, Kyra and Aiden learn that there may be something more between them than just playful flirting. But when Kyra enters a renowned jewelry contest to raise enough money to outbid the mystery renter, Aiden finds himself in a race against time to make everything right." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt13012364/","name":"One of a Kind Love","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGY4MWQwNTEtOTEzMC00NDdjLWIwMTItMzcyZDhiMWNiM2JmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTk1NzUwMA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Kyra's dreams of being a jeweler have been put on the backburner, as her demanding job at the Sawyer Country Club is her priority. The script has a pleasant and quick plot, the cast is good, the scenery is beautiful and the leading actors are sweet, good looking and well suited for the characters they portray! They definetely have chemistry!!!

You can understand from the first moment Kyra and Eidan will have their happy ending, with the usual misunderstanding near the end of the movie but.... has a nice twist.... instead the usual format where this keeps going on and on..... O pracy nad najnowszymi hollywoodzkimi produkcjami opowiadają ich twórcy - znani reżyserzy i aktorzy. Autorzy magazynu przedstawiają również zwiastuny filmów wchodzących na ekrany kin.

The Children Act
W imię dziecka
The Children Act
programme.desc: The Children Act: Directed by Richard Eyre. With Emma Thompson, Stanley Tucci, Jason Watkins, Naomi Frederick. As her marriage crumbles, a judge must decide a case involving a teenage boy who is refusing a blood transfusion on religious principle." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6040662/","name":"The Children Act","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODUwOTk1MzI3NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTI4NDE3NTM@._V1_.jpg","description":"As her marriage crumbles, a judge must decide a case involving a teenage boy who is refusing a blood transfusion on religious principle.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6040662/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"lor_"},"dateCreated":"2018-09-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"Emma's tour-de-force performance stirs an incisive drama","reviewBody":"Kudos to all hands involved in making "The Children Act", a chamber drama about a family court Justice in London failing to achieve balance between her job and her private life. The legal issues involved are clearcut, but star Emma Thompson's acting brings out the profound emotional and pyschological issues underneath.\n\nStanley Tucci is perfect in understated support as her neglected husband, and a true discovery here is Fionn Whitehead as the teenage protagonist, a Jehovah's Witness whose life hangs in the balance as his parents, Church elders and he himself refuse the blood transfusions necessary to give his treatment for leukemia a chance to save his life. Fionn Whitehead, previously in a lead role in "Dunkirk", struck me as a powerhouse at the level of a young Tom Courtenay, and would be perfectly cast as either Billy Liar or the Long Distance Runner."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12602,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-08-24","keywords":"female judge,husband wife relationship,teenage boy,teenager,17 year old","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2677390105","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOGIzYmNjOGItNWY1ZC00ZmI5LWFhMGMtZTI0OGMwYTczNmE5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOGIzYmNjOGItNWY1ZC00ZmI5LWFhMGMtZTI0OGMwYTczNmE5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"As her marriage to Jack (Stanley Tucci) flounders, eminent High Court judge Fiona Maye (Emma Thompson) has a life-changing decision to make at work - should she force a teenage boy, Adam (Fionn Whitehead), to have the blood transfusion that will save his life? Her unorthodox visit to his hospital bedside has a profound impact on them both, stirring strong new emotions in the boy and long-buried feelings in her."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000668/","name":"Emma Thompson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001804/","name":"Stanley Tucci"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0914327/","name":"Jason Watkins"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0264236/","name":"Richard Eyre"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0209419/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0103694/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0251858/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0568605/","name":"Ian McEwan"}],"duration":"PT1H45M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: 10 giorni senza mamma

10 giorni senza mamma
programme.desc: 10 giorni senza mamma: Directed by Alessandro Genovesi. With Fabio De Luigi, Valentina Lodovini, Angelica Elli, Bianca Usai. What happens if an always-present mother decides to leave for 10 days, leaving the three children with a father who was practically absent until then?" data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8660788/","name":"10 giorni senza mamma","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzUzMzhkMGYtOTU1Ni00Y2UzLWJkOTktMjg3ZWFjM2ExOTM4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzQ4MDQ4ODc@._V1_.jpg","description":"What happens if an always-present mother decides to leave for 10 days, leaving the three children with a father who was practically absent until then?","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8660788/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"avillamaina"},"dateCreated":"2021-09-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"Usual stereotypes, moderate humour","reviewBody":"This movie builds on the nowadays common stereotypes where mothers don't have a job in spite of being truly brilliant, being able to steer through a myriad of daily chores and activities with kids while working fathers are completely useless, showing that they would never cope with switching roles, not even for 10 days. I find this rather sexist and insulting.\n\nApart from this there are some fun situations here and there, but overall it's just below average humour.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":3}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1027,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6},"genre":["Comedy","Family"],"datePublished":"2019-02-07","keywords":"children,father son relationship,father daughter relationship,husband wife relationship,remake","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer originale italiano [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi790018585","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmI2YzRiYmUtOTNmYy00MGM1LWIyYTItNzQzZTI3ZDlkYTkyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmI2YzRiYmUtOTNmYy00MGM1LWIyYTItNzQzZTI3ZDlkYTkyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0209948/","name":"Fabio De Luigi"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1779438/","name":"Valentina Lodovini"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm10406294/","name":"Angelica Elli"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3500190/","name":"Alessandro Genovesi"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0030393/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4996440/","name":"Giovanni Bognetti"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3500190/","name":"Alessandro Genovesi"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0893556/","name":"Juan Vera"}],"duration":"PT1H34M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: The Violent Heart: Directed by Kerem Sanga. With Jovan Adepo, Grace Van Patten, Lukas Haas, Mary J. Blige. Fifteen years after the murder of his older sister, Daniel finds himself falling for Cassie, a vivacious high school senior." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8310476/","name":"The Violent Heart","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGFhYmVjMDktNTc1ZC00ZDg1LThlNzktN2EyZDY3ODk2Njg5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTAyMjQ3NzQ1._V1_.jpg","description":"Fifteen years after the murder of his older sister, Daniel finds himself falling for Cassie, a vivacious high school senior.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8310476/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"A_Different_Drummer"},"dateCreated":"2021-02-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"Engage. Engage. Engage.","reviewBody":"Leave aside for the moment that Sanga is exploring Hitchcockian beats that most film-goers have not seen in their lifetimes. And leave aside also the perfect casting, especially Van Patten successfully selling a complicated and counter-intuitive character ,while at the same time playing Older-4-Younger. What really matters is that Sanga stuck to the core rule of story-telling that so many modern auteurs forget -- engage the viewer. Connect to the character. Jeden gniewny człowiek
Wrath of Man
programme.desc: غضب الرجل: Directed by Guy Ritchie. With Jason Statham, Holt McCallany, Rocci Williams, Josh Hartnett. The plot follows H, a cold and mysterious character working at a cash truck company responsible for moving hundreds of millions of dollars around Los Angeles each week." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt11083552/","name":"Wrath of Man","alternateName":"غضب الرجل","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGVkOTlhOTktNjZiNS00NDg3LWIxMDAtZTY5Y2E0YjllN2IxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The plot follows H, a cold and mysterious character working at a cash truck company responsible for moving hundreds of millions of dollars around Los Angeles each week.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt11083552/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"SnoopyStyle"},"dateCreated":"2021-05-27","inLanguage":"English","name":"Ritchie does another crime thriller","reviewBody":"In L. A., an armored truck is robbed and the two drivers are killed. Patrick Hill (Jason Statham) barely passes the tests to be the new hire at the company. When his truck gets hit, he turns into the Terminator.\n\nThis is a Guy Ritchie film. It's a mid-level action thriller. It mostly works although it insists on following the story from all sides which leaves the film at almost two hours. By grouping the different sides separately, they do feel a bit split especially the story of the robbers. I do wonder if the search for the inside man would be a more compelling path. Ritchie is trying for a tighter thriller than his usual. It's him slimmed down. He uses his action skills but this is not going to be considered one of his best or most inventive.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":133744,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Crime","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2021-05-13","keywords":"revenge,remake,police,shootout,non linear narrative","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Get Tickets","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3455041561","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmQ3Y2Q3N2YtNzMzNy00YWI1LTllMjgtMWViZWM4NTk4ODllXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmQ3Y2Q3N2YtNzMzNy00YWI1LTllMjgtMWViZWM4NTk4ODllXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg","description":"A mysterious and wild-eyed new cash truck security guard (Jason Statham) surprises his coworkers during a heist in which he unexpectedly unleashes precision skills. The crew is left wondering who he is and where he came from. Soon, the marksman's ultimate motive becomes clear as he takes dramatic and irrevocable steps to settle a score."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005458/","name":"Jason Statham"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0564697/","name":"Holt McCallany"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001326/","name":"Josh Hartnett"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005363/","name":"Guy Ritchie"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0007143/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0022594/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0719257/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0099398/","name":"Nicolas Boukhrief"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0078704/","name":"Éric Besnard"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005363/","name":"Guy Ritchie"}],"duration":"PT1H59M"}</script><metacontent="
