An immigrant worker at a pickle factory is accidentally preserved for 100 years and wakes up in modern-day Brooklyn." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt9059704/","name":"An American Pickle","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmRkZmZiNzUtMzgwYy00NTEzLWE2NjctMmI3NGI5ZTBiNDdkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzE3ODQxNjU@._V1_.jpg","description":"An immigrant worker at a pickle factory is accidentally preserved for 100 years and wakes up in modern-day Brooklyn.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt9059704/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"DeadMansTrousers","dateCreated":"2020-08-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"Nothing amazing but it was enjoyable","reviewBody":"As others have pointed out this is not your typical Seth Rogen film. This is his attempt to make a fish out of water story in the style of Splash or Big and while he doesn't reinvent the wheel in doing so there were some enjoyable moments. This is obviously meant to be a film which you can watch with you family, it is not vulgar and it focuses on the importance of family values and relationships. There are many moments/jokes in this film that have to do with Judaism which Seth has joked about previously, but here this is much more of a love note to that part of his life. I think maybe some of the negativity being directed at this film is because some people don't understand that aspect of it. They instead are expecting the normal stoner humour Seth Rogen. I think this movie is worth watching if you want to see a different side of Seth and don't mind seeing the things I mentioned.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":21175,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.7,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy"],"datePublished":"2020-08-06","keywords":"time travel,time traveler,immigrant,jewish,brooklyn","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3105799705","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODU3MWM3MmYtYTdiNi00YmI4LWI2MTMtMjYzNzM4OTE1NzdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODU3MWM3MmYtYTdiNi00YmI4LWI2MTMtMjYzNzM4OTE1NzdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"AN AMERICAN PICKLE, directed by Brandon Trost, is based on Simon Rich's New Yorker novella and stars Seth Rogen as Herschel Greenbaum, a struggling laborer who immigrates to America in 1920 with dreams of building a better life for his beloved family. One day, while working at his factory job, he falls into a vat of pickles and is brined for 100 years. The brine preserves him perfectly and when he emerges in present-day Brooklyn, he finds that he hasn't aged a day. But when he seeks out his family, he is troubled to learn that his only surviving relative is his great-grandson, Ben Greenbaum (also played by Rogen), a mild-mannered computer coder whom Herschel can't even begin to understand.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0736622/","name":"Seth Rogen","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3512758/","name":"Sarah Snook","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6127780/","name":"Molly Evensen"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1060930/","name":"Brandon Trost"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0345956/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0719807/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0026545/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2919995/","name":"Simon Rich"],"duration":"PT1H28M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: 12 Mighty Orphans
Potężne sierotki
12 Mighty Orphans
programme.desc:
12 Mighty Orphans: Directed by Ty Roberts. With Luke Wilson, Vinessa Shaw, Wayne Knight, Martin Sheen. Haunted by his mysterious past, a devoted high school football coach leads a scrawny team of orphans to the state championship during the Great Depression and inspires a broken nation along the way." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8482584/","name":"12 Mighty Orphans","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWMxNzA1NWEtYjgwMC00ZjkwLTljYjYtN2E3ZWIzODJlN2Y4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyOTgxNDIzMTY@._V1_.jpg","description":"Haunted by his mysterious past, a devoted high school football coach leads a scrawny team of orphans to the state championship during the Great Depression and inspires a broken nation along the way.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8482584/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"thekarmicnomad"},"dateCreated":"2021-09-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"Enjoyable and sweet","reviewBody":"This is one of those movies that you can tell what you are getting by the poster and the tittle.

Some orphaned young men in the 1930's are waiting to come of age.

They have little prospects, no family and are too old to realistically be adopted.

In a time of high morals and little else the boys have a bleak future.

Until Rusty Russell and his wife turn up and see if they can give them a future through American football.

This has great performances, is well produced and has all the heart warming elements you would expect from a story of this type.

An excellent Sunday afternoon watch - hang around for the real life bio's at the credits.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3298,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["History","Sport"],"datePublished":"2021-06-18","keywords":"depression era,1930s,football team,football game,football movie","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"12 Mighty Orphans","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi234995737","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTRhYmQ3MzgtZTM3Yi00MzFkLTgxNGMtMTEyNjE3NzNjZjQ0XkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTRhYmQ3MzgtZTM3Yi00MzFkLTgxNGMtMTEyNjE3NzNjZjQ0XkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Official Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005561/","name":"Luke Wilson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005416/","name":"Vinessa Shaw"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001431/","name":"Wayne Knight"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1010213/","name":"Ty Roberts"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0700536/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0188962/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0174505/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1291887/","name":"Jim Dent"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1010213/","name":"Ty Roberts"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1460812/","name":"Lane Garrison"}],"duration":"PT1H58M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: An American Pickle
Amerykanin w marynacie
An American Pickle
programme.desc: An American Pickle: Directed by Brandon Trost. With Seth Rogen, Sarah Snook, Molly Evensen, Eliot Glazer. An immigrant worker at a pickle factory is accidentally preserved for 100 years and wakes up in modern-day Brooklyn." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt9059704/","name":"An American Pickle","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmRkZmZiNzUtMzgwYy00NTEzLWE2NjctMmI3NGI5ZTBiNDdkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzE3ODQxNjU@._V1_.jpg","description":"An immigrant worker at a pickle factory is accidentally preserved for 100 years and wakes up in modern-day Brooklyn.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt9059704/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"DeadMansTrousers"},"dateCreated":"2020-08-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"Nothing amazing but it was enjoyable","reviewBody":"As others have pointed out this is not your typical Seth Rogen film. This is his attempt to make a fish out of water story in the style of Splash or Big and while he doesn't reinvent the wheel in doing so there were some enjoyable moments. This is obviously meant to be a film which you can watch with you family, it is not vulgar and it focuses on the importance of family values and relationships. There are many moments/jokes in this film that have to do with Judaism which Seth has joked about previously, but here this is much more of a love note to that part of his life. I think maybe some of the negativity being directed at this film is because some people don't understand that aspect of it. They instead are expecting the normal stoner humour Seth Rogen. I think this movie is worth watching if you want to see a different side of Seth and don't mind seeing the things I mentioned.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":21175,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.7},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy"],"datePublished":"2020-08-06","keywords":"time travel,time traveler,immigrant,jewish,brooklyn","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3105799705","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODU3MWM3MmYtYTdiNi00YmI4LWI2MTMtMjYzNzM4OTE1NzdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODU3MWM3MmYtYTdiNi00YmI4LWI2MTMtMjYzNzM4OTE1NzdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"AN AMERICAN PICKLE, directed by Brandon Trost, is based on Simon Rich's New Yorker novella and stars Seth Rogen as Herschel Greenbaum, a struggling laborer who immigrates to America in 1920 with dreams of building a better life for his beloved family. One day, while working at his factory job, he falls into a vat of pickles and is brined for 100 years. The brine preserves him perfectly and when he emerges in present-day Brooklyn, he finds that he hasn't aged a day. But when he seeks out his family, he is troubled to learn that his only surviving relative is his great-grandson, Ben Greenbaum (also played by Rogen), a mild-mannered computer coder whom Herschel can't even begin to understand."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0736622/","name":"Seth Rogen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3512758/","name":"Sarah Snook"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6127780/","name":"Molly Evensen"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1060930/","name":"Brandon Trost"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0345956/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0719807/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0026545/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2919995/","name":"Simon Rich"}],"duration":"PT1H28M"}</script><metacontent="

An immigrant worker at a pickle factory is accidentally preserved for 100 years and wakes up in modern-day Brooklyn." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt9059704/","name":"An American Pickle","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmRkZmZiNzUtMzgwYy00NTEzLWE2NjctMmI3NGI5ZTBiNDdkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzE3ODQxNjU@._V1_.jpg","description":"An immigrant worker at a pickle factory is accidentally preserved for 100 years and wakes up in modern-day Brooklyn.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt9059704/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"DeadMansTrousers","dateCreated":"2020-08-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"Nothing amazing but it was enjoyable","reviewBody":"As others have pointed out this is not your typical Seth Rogen film. This is his attempt to make a fish out of water story in the style of Splash or Big and while he doesn't reinvent the wheel in doing so there were some enjoyable moments. This is obviously meant to be a film which you can watch with you family, it is not vulgar and it focuses on the importance of family values and relationships. There are many moments/jokes in this film that have to do with Judaism which Seth has joked about previously, but here this is much more of a love note to that part of his life. I think maybe some of the negativity being directed at this film is because some people don't understand that aspect of it. They instead are expecting the normal stoner humour Seth Rogen. I think this movie is worth watching if you want to see a different side of Seth and don't mind seeing the things I mentioned.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":21175,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.7,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy"],"datePublished":"2020-08-06","keywords":"time travel,time traveler,immigrant,jewish,brooklyn","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3105799705","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODU3MWM3MmYtYTdiNi00YmI4LWI2MTMtMjYzNzM4OTE1NzdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODU3MWM3MmYtYTdiNi00YmI4LWI2MTMtMjYzNzM4OTE1NzdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"AN AMERICAN PICKLE, directed by Brandon Trost, is based on Simon Rich's New Yorker novella and stars Seth Rogen as Herschel Greenbaum, a struggling laborer who immigrates to America in 1920 with dreams of building a better life for his beloved family. One day, while working at his factory job, he falls into a vat of pickles and is brined for 100 years. The brine preserves him perfectly and when he emerges in present-day Brooklyn, he finds that he hasn't aged a day. But when he seeks out his family, he is troubled to learn that his only surviving relative is his great-grandson, Ben Greenbaum (also played by Rogen), a mild-mannered computer coder whom Herschel can't even begin to understand.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0736622/","name":"Seth Rogen","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3512758/","name":"Sarah Snook","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6127780/","name":"Molly Evensen"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1060930/","name":"Brandon Trost"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0345956/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0719807/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0026545/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2919995/","name":"Simon Rich"],"duration":"PT1H28M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Dream Horse
Wymarzony koń
Dream Horse
programme.desc:
Dream Horse: Directed by Euros Lyn. With Toni Collette, Owen Teale, Alan David, Lynda Baron. Dream Alliance is an unlikely race horse bred by small-town Welsh bartender Jan Vokes. With no experience, Jan convinces her neighbors to chip in their meager earnings to help raise Dream in the hopes he can compete with the racing elites." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt9883996/","name":"Dream Horse","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTQ5MmRlYWItZmNiYS00ZmE5LTg4NjAtZjZjZjNjYTRhMDY1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMDM2NDM2MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Dream Alliance is an unlikely race horse bred by small-town Welsh bartender Jan Vokes. With no experience, Jan convinces her neighbors to chip in their meager earnings to help raise Dream in the hopes he can compete with the racing e","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt9883996/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"bob-the-movie-man"},"dateCreated":"2021-06-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Neigh lad.. a predictable flick that just didn't connect with me","reviewBody":"An extraordinary story of ambition against all the odds - based on a true story - will Dream Alliance fulfil the town's dreams, or will it all end in tears?

Positives: 
* Toni Collette! Without her powerful acting presence at the heart of the piece, I think the movie would have died in a ditch. As for her Welsh accent I (as an Englishman) thought it was pretty good: on my 'Welshometer', using the scale of Richard Burton as a 10 to RDW's "Doctor Dolittle" as a 1, I'd give Ms Collette about an 8. The illustrious Mrs Movie Man (as a Welsh lady) was less impressed, but found her "tolerable" when mixed with the other Welsh-born actors!



* And what a wonderful supporting cast of well know names from all our yesterdays. Just so great to see the great Siân Phillips ("I, Claudius"), Lynda Baron ('Nurse Gladys' from "Open all Hours"), Peter Davison ("Doctor Who") and Nicholas Farrell ("Chariots of Fire") in the cast. It was also (as is traditional in these "true stories") for the actual people to appear alongside their acting counterparts in the end titles: Howard Davies in particular seemed to be chuffed to bits to be singing alongside Damien Lewis!



* Hats off to cinematographer Erik Wilson and Chris Bates (the "drone operator"), for some impressive shots. The camera angles from the turf-pumping racing scenes are very impressive.


Negatives: 
* How did it make me feel? Very little at all. Which is a problem. The movie is so utterly predictable that I saw every element of the story play out way before it did. Did this happen in real life? In which case, that's annoying that life was so unrealistically predictable in its ups and downs!



* Elements of the story also felt formulaic: from the token comedy cranky old bloke (Karl Johnson) to Jan's brooding father-with-a-grudge. This latter element seems unnecessarily bolted onto the plot: poorly worked through and pretty superfluous.


Summary Thoughts on "Dream Horse": This is a feature debut for welsh-born Euros Lyn, most familiar (as a peculiar name) for popping up in the end credits of TV shows such as "Doctor Who", "Torchwood" and "His Dark Materials". And, as a great supporter of UK films, I really wanted to like this one. But it just didn't do it for me. It's also unfortunate that some of the subject material makes it unsuitable for the 6-to-8 year old horse fanatics... this is no "International Velvet".

I've seen some social media comments from people who adore the movie. And, to be clear, it's NOT a bad movie. I just personally didn't connect with me. Just goes to show that cinema really is 'horses for courses' sometimes!

(For the full graphical review, please check out One Mann's Movies on the web or Facebook... or my onemannsmovies channel on TikTok. Thanks).","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3378,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Biography","Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2021-06-04","keywords":"triumph of the human spirit,underdog story,horse trainer,horse race,singing on a bus","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi686014489","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODQ0ZmRmOGEtZjJhNi00MThjLWEzNzgtMGQ2NjQwNzYwZjkyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODQ0ZmRmOGEtZjJhNi00MThjLWEzNzgtMGQ2NjQwNzYwZjkyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg","description":"Dream Alliance is an unlikely race horse bred by small-town Welsh bartender Jan Vokes. With no experience, Jan convinces her neighbors to chip in their meager earnings to help raise Dream in the hopes he can compete with the racing elites."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001057/","name":"Toni Collette"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0853583/","name":"Owen Teale"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0202804/","name":"Alan David"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0528186/","name":"Euros Lyn"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0484683/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0197272/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0209925/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0571032/","name":"Neil McKay"}],"duration":"PT1H53M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Un peuple et son roi
Naród i jego król
Un peuple et son roi
programme.desc:
Un peuple et son roi: Directed by Pierre Schoeller. With Gaspard Ulliel, Adèle Haenel, Olivier Gourmet, Louis Garrel. The intertwining fates of the historical figures, the men and the women of the 1789 French revolution, as they meet at the newly established Assemblée Nationale." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt7073522/","name":"Un peuple et son roi","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDQ0MjBhNDgtMmY4ZC00NjhkLWI3NjMtZDU5NjI0ZmNkMDRkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzExNDQ2NDM@._V1_.jpg","description":"The intertwining fates of the historical figures, the men and the women of the 1789 French revolution, as they meet at the newly established Assemblée Nationale.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7073522/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"tmontpellier"},"dateCreated":"2018-10-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"A succession of images is not a film","reviewBody":"First, the title is wrong: the king is absent of the movie and carricatured when shown. The link between the king and the people is not shown or analysed.

Second, even if the episodes or the short stories are well depicted and in a way interesting, it doesn't make a film. Where is a story? Where is something to care about? It's not even a documentary. It's not much...

Third, the « left wing » (populist?) vision of a people betrayed by the « elites » is boring.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1272,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9},"genre":["Drama","History"],"datePublished":"2018-09-26","keywords":"french revolution,guillotine,france,18th century,french history","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bande-annonce [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1143520025","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGIyZWI0MWUtODI3My00NmRiLWFlYzQtMGU4NzI2MzZlYmNlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGIyZWI0MWUtODI3My00NmRiLWFlYzQtMGU4NzI2MzZlYmNlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0880484/","name":"Gaspard Ulliel"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1194748/","name":"Adèle Haenel"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0332709/","name":"Olivier Gourmet"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0778144/","name":"Pierre Schoeller"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0016569/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0047476/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0044140/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0778144/","name":"Pierre Schoeller"}],"duration":"PT2H1M"}</script><metacontent="

Third, the « left wing » (populist?) vision of a people betrayed by the « elites » is boring.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1272,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9,"genre":["Drama","History"],"datePublished":"2018-09-26","keywords":"french revolution,guillotine,france,18th century,french history","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bande-annonce [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1143520025","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGIyZWI0MWUtODI3My00NmRiLWFlYzQtMGU4NzI2MzZlYmNlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGIyZWI0MWUtODI3My00NmRiLWFlYzQtMGU4NzI2MzZlYmNlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0880484/","name":"Gaspard Ulliel","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1194748/","name":"Adèle Haenel","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0332709/","name":"Olivier Gourmet"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0778144/","name":"Pierre Schoeller"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0016569/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0047476/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0044140/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0778144/","name":"Pierre Schoeller"],"duration":"PT2H1M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Daddy's Home
Tata kontra tata
Daddy's Home
programme.desc:
Daddy's Home: Directed by Sean Anders. With Will Ferrell, Mark Wahlberg, Linda Cardellini, Thomas Haden Church. Brad Whitaker is a radio host trying to get his stepchildren to love him and call him Dad. But his plans turn upside down when their biological father, Dusty Mayron, returns." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1528854/","name":"Daddy's Home","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ0OTE1MTk4N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDM5OTk5NjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Brad Whitaker is a radio host trying to get his stepchildren to love him and call him Dad. But his plans turn upside down when their biological father, Dusty Mayron, returns.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1528854/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jtindahouse"},"dateCreated":"2015-12-26","inLanguage":"English","name":"Has its moments but it's no game-changer","reviewBody":"'Daddy's Home' is the second collaboration between Will Ferrell and Mark Wahlberg, the first being 2010's 'The Other Guys'. There's no doubt the two have chemistry. What there is doubt about is how to perfectly utilise each of the two as characters. The problem is that for Wahlberg's confident, in-charge character (which he has to play) to work Ferrell needs to play the straight guy and that isn't when he's at his best. He does it well there's no doubt about it, but he's at his best when his character has an edge to him like 'Ron Burgundy' or his character in 'Step Brothers'. Playing the overly straight guy just seems almost a waste for the one Ferrell movie we get a year, even though no one could deny he still does it very well. 

The difference in quality between this and 'Get Hard' is noticeable. There, Kevin Hart was unable to find a chemistry with Ferrell and it just turned into the two competing with each other trying to make the movie their own. Here that's not the case. Wahlberg seems happy to let Ferrell take the reins and is comfortable just doing what he does best, with his laid back, dry sense of humour accompanying Ferrell perfectly. 

There are consistent laughs throughout, but perhaps not one stand out scene that will be memorable for years to come. It doesn't push the envelope as much as other Ferrell movies have in the past either. I really would love to see him always be given free rein to say and do as he pleases but also understand why that can't always be the case. If you're just looking to get your annual fix of a bit of Ferrell hilarity then you won't be disappointed. If you are looking for a game-changer, perhaps wait for the next one.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":115615,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Family"],"datePublished":"2015-12-30","keywords":"sweat,pull,pull ups,push,muscle","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1706799641","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzM0NjMzMzAzOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTQwMjExNzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzM0NjMzMzAzOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTQwMjExNzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A mild-mannered radio executive strives to become the best stepdad to his wife's two children, but complications ensue when their freewheeling and freeloading real father arrives, forcing him to compete for the affection of the kids."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002071/","name":"Will Ferrell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000242/","name":"Mark Wahlberg"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004802/","name":"Linda Cardellini"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1890845/","name":"Sean Anders"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023400/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0325207/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0186190/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0122602/","name":"Brian Burns"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1890845/","name":"Sean Anders"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1898234/","name":"John Morris"}],"duration":"PT1H36M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: الصراع المميت: Directed by Simon McQuoid. With Lewis Tan, Jessica McNamee, Josh Lawson, Joe Taslim. MMA fighter Cole Young seeks out Earth's greatest champions in order to stand against the enemies of Outworld in a high stakes battle for the universe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0293429/","name":"Mortal Kombat","alternateName":"الصراع المميت","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2ZlNWIxODMtN2YwZi00ZjNmLWIyN2UtZTFkYmZkNDQyNTAyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODkzNTgxMDg@._V1_.jpg","description":"MMA fighter Cole Young seeks out Earth's greatest champions in order to stand against the enemies of Outworld in a high stakes battle for the universe.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0293429/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"viantyara"},"dateCreated":"2021-04-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"Fun, gory but could be better!","reviewBody":"I don't really play Mortal Kombat or even follow the concept behind it. But even so, I enjoyed this movie. The fighting choreography is top notch! The costume, the cgi is also worth the hype. I love that they decided to make it rated R. But there's also some things that bothered me, like some bad cinematography, cheesy dialogues, and the somehow boring protagonist. The act 3 of the movie really felt rushed like the writers only had 5 minutes left to finish the script. I hope the sequel will have a better act 3.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":155279,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Adventure","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2021-04-23","keywords":"based on video game,gore,graphic violence,reboot,two word title","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4226400281","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjNjMTdkNjUtNzRmNi00ZTZjLTgzMDUtNzBhNTVmODUwM2QxXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjNjMTdkNjUtNzRmNi00ZTZjLTgzMDUtNzBhNTVmODUwM2QxXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg","description":"MMA fighter Cole Young seeks out Earth's greatest champions in order to stand against the enemies of Outworld in a high stakes battle for the universe."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1167985/","name":"Lewis Tan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2537621/","name":"Jessica McNamee"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0493257/","name":"Josh Lawson"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2585406/","name":"Simon McQuoid"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046718/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0504531/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0163543/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3859643/","name":"Greg Russo"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1709264/","name":"Dave Callaham"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3349927/","name":"Oren Uziel"}],"duration":"PT1H50M"}</script><metacontent="

I hope the sequel will have a better act 3.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":155279,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Adventure","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2021-04-23","keywords":"based on video game,gore,graphic violence,reboot,two word title","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4226400281","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjNjMTdkNjUtNzRmNi00ZTZjLTgzMDUtNzBhNTVmODUwM2QxXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjNjMTdkNjUtNzRmNi00ZTZjLTgzMDUtNzBhNTVmODUwM2QxXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg","description":"MMA fighter Cole Young seeks out Earth's greatest champions in order to stand against the enemies of Outworld in a high stakes battle for the universe.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1167985/","name":"Lewis Tan","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2537621/","name":"Jessica McNamee","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0493257/","name":"Josh Lawson"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2585406/","name":"Simon McQuoid"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046718/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0504531/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0163543/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3859643/","name":"Greg Russo","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1709264/","name":"Dave Callaham","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3349927/","name":"Oren Uziel"],"duration":"PT1H50M"</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: The Craft: Legacy: Directed by Zoe Lister-Jones. With Cailee Spaeny, Zoey Luna, Gideon Adlon, Lovie Simone. A group of high school students form a coven of witches." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt4685762/","name":"The Craft: Legacy","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjY0YzYwM2YtMzcyOC00YmFjLTgxMzEtNzg0YjEwYjlhY2I5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTEyMjM2NDc2._V1_.jpg","description":"A group of high school students form a coven of witches.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4685762/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"lewismusgrove88"},"dateCreated":"2020-10-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"Disappointing","reviewBody":"The movie was much more tender, drama like and "woke" than I cared for to be honest. There was literally zero character build-up and whilst the acting was good, the storyline was pretty basic overall. I would've liked a darker tone with another nutter (Nancy style) who takes stuff too far and walks on water so I was kinda disappointed with this high school TV movie offering. The twist was pretty predicable too but whatever, I've come to the realization that remakes are never as good as the originals.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":4}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":11460,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.5},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Drama","Fantasy","Horror"],"datePublished":"2020-10-28","keywords":"witch,witchcraft,high school student,mexican american,blumhouse productions","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Watch Now on Prime Video Cinema","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2648883481","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTFlZjE0YWMtYzI5ZC00YWFhLWFlNmYtZGQxNmY2MmUwZGVjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTFlZjE0YWMtYzI5ZC00YWFhLWFlNmYtZGQxNmY2MmUwZGVjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg","description":"A newcomer to a Catholic prep high school falls in with a trio of outcast teenage girls who practice witchcraft, and they all soon conjure up various spells and curses against those who anger them."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm8314228/","name":"Cailee Spaeny"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm10656367/","name":"Zoey Luna"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4594069/","name":"Gideon Adlon"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1830380/","name":"Zoe Lister-Jones"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0098315/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0093794/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1830380/","name":"Zoe Lister-Jones"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0276823/","name":"Peter Filardi"}],"duration":"PT1H37M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Resident Evil
Resident Evil
programme.desc:
Resident Evil: Directed by Paul W.S. Anderson. With Ryan McCluskey, Oscar Pearce, Indra Ové, Anna Bolt. A special military unit fights a powerful, out-of-control supercomputer and hundreds of scientists who have mutated into flesh-eating creatures after a laboratory accident." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0120804/","name":"Resident Evil","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmI1ZGRhNDYtOGVjZC00MmUyLThlNTktMTQyZGE3MzE1ZTdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDE5MTU2MDE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A special military unit fights a powerful, out-of-control supercomputer and hundreds of scientists who have mutated into flesh-eating creatures after a laboratory accident.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0120804/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"mbworm"},"dateCreated":"2008-01-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"Scary and atmospheric","reviewBody":""Resident Evil" was a smart and scary game. The darkness and the surprises were huge scare factors. In that famous game, you find yourself trapped in a mansion crawling with the undead because of a mistake made by the Umbrella Corporation.

Director Paul W.S. Anderson makes a fast, dark guilty pleasure of a film from this game with "Resident Evil".

Milla Jovovich is Alice, who wakes up in a creepy, poorly lit mansion at night in a remote forest. She has no memory of who she is or why she's here, but after a group of soldiers bursts in and takes her to a hidden lab underneath the mansion with them, she quickly begins to realize a terrible secret. She and the others find themselves locked in "The Hive", an enormous, elaborate underground structure that was sealed by the supercomputer controlling it. It soon becomes evident that an experiment called "The T-Virus" escaped into the air and killed everyone. But nobody really stayed dead. Now the remaining survivors must fight their way back out of The Hive before the door seals permanently... and at the same time they must contain the virus before it reaches the surface. 

The film moves at a breakneck pace, with some elaborate sets and great cinematography that sets the dark mood well for this atmospheric sci-fi thriller.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":260175,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Horror","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2002-08-28","keywords":"doberman,cut into pieces,zombie,commando,kissing while having sex","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Resident Evil","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2894266649","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjI4NDZjNWUtNDBkMy00ZTY5LWJkMjEtMmFhZWIxZjAyZjMxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjI4NDZjNWUtNDBkMy00ZTY5LWJkMjEtMmFhZWIxZjAyZjMxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Columbia Tristar"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000170/","name":"Milla Jovovich"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0735442/","name":"Michelle Rodriguez"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1011675/","name":"Ryan McCluskey"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0027271/","name":"Paul W.S. Anderson"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002257/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0224322/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0032081/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0027271/","name":"Paul W.S. Anderson"}],"duration":"PT1H40M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: An American Pickle
Amerykanin w marynacie
An American Pickle
programme.desc: An American Pickle: Directed by Brandon Trost. With Seth Rogen, Sarah Snook, Molly Evensen, Eliot Glazer. An immigrant worker at a pickle factory is accidentally preserved for 100 years and wakes up in modern-day Brooklyn." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt9059704/","name":"An American Pickle","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmRkZmZiNzUtMzgwYy00NTEzLWE2NjctMmI3NGI5ZTBiNDdkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzE3ODQxNjU@._V1_.jpg","description":"An immigrant worker at a pickle factory is accidentally preserved for 100 years and wakes up in modern-day Brooklyn.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt9059704/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"DeadMansTrousers"},"dateCreated":"2020-08-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"Nothing amazing but it was enjoyable","reviewBody":"As others have pointed out this is not your typical Seth Rogen film. This is his attempt to make a fish out of water story in the style of Splash or Big and while he doesn't reinvent the wheel in doing so there were some enjoyable moments. This is obviously meant to be a film which you can watch with you family, it is not vulgar and it focuses on the importance of family values and relationships. There are many moments/jokes in this film that have to do with Judaism which Seth has joked about previously, but here this is much more of a love note to that part of his life. I think maybe some of the negativity being directed at this film is because some people don't understand that aspect of it. They instead are expecting the normal stoner humour Seth Rogen. I think this movie is worth watching if you want to see a different side of Seth and don't mind seeing the things I mentioned.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":21175,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.7},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy"],"datePublished":"2020-08-06","keywords":"time travel,time traveler,immigrant,jewish,brooklyn","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3105799705","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODU3MWM3MmYtYTdiNi00YmI4LWI2MTMtMjYzNzM4OTE1NzdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODU3MWM3MmYtYTdiNi00YmI4LWI2MTMtMjYzNzM4OTE1NzdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"AN AMERICAN PICKLE, directed by Brandon Trost, is based on Simon Rich's New Yorker novella and stars Seth Rogen as Herschel Greenbaum, a struggling laborer who immigrates to America in 1920 with dreams of building a better life for his beloved family. One day, while working at his factory job, he falls into a vat of pickles and is brined for 100 years. The brine preserves him perfectly and when he emerges in present-day Brooklyn, he finds that he hasn't aged a day. But when he seeks out his family, he is troubled to learn that his only surviving relative is his great-grandson, Ben Greenbaum (also played by Rogen), a mild-mannered computer coder whom Herschel can't even begin to understand."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0736622/","name":"Seth Rogen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3512758/","name":"Sarah Snook"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6127780/","name":"Molly Evensen"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1060930/","name":"Brandon Trost"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0345956/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0719807/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0026545/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2919995/","name":"Simon Rich"}],"duration":"PT1H28M"}</script><metacontent="

An immigrant worker at a pickle factory is accidentally preserved for 100 years and wakes up in modern-day Brooklyn." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt9059704/","name":"An American Pickle","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmRkZmZiNzUtMzgwYy00NTEzLWE2NjctMmI3NGI5ZTBiNDdkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzE3ODQxNjU@._V1_.jpg","description":"An immigrant worker at a pickle factory is accidentally preserved for 100 years and wakes up in modern-day Brooklyn.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt9059704/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"DeadMansTrousers","dateCreated":"2020-08-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"Nothing amazing but it was enjoyable","reviewBody":"As others have pointed out this is not your typical Seth Rogen film. This is his attempt to make a fish out of water story in the style of Splash or Big and while he doesn't reinvent the wheel in doing so there were some enjoyable moments. This is obviously meant to be a film which you can watch with you family, it is not vulgar and it focuses on the importance of family values and relationships. There are many moments/jokes in this film that have to do with Judaism which Seth has joked about previously, but here this is much more of a love note to that part of his life. I think maybe some of the negativity being directed at this film is because some people don't understand that aspect of it. They instead are expecting the normal stoner humour Seth Rogen. One day, while working at his factory job, he falls into a vat of pickles and is brined for 100 years. The brine preserves him perfectly and when he emerges in present-day Brooklyn, he finds that he hasn't aged a day. But when he seeks out his family, he is troubled to learn that his only surviving relative is his great-grandson, Ben Greenbaum (also played by Rogen), a mild-mannered computer coder whom Herschel can't even begin to understand.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0736622/","name":"Seth Rogen","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3512758/","name":"Sarah Snook","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6127780/","name":"Molly Evensen"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1060930/","name":"Brandon Trost"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0345956/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0719807/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0026545/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2919995/","name":"Simon Rich"],"duration":"PT1H28M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Enchanted Christmas Cake
Zaczarowane ciasto świąteczne
The Enchanted Christmas Cake
programme.desc:
The Enchanted Christmas Cake: Directed by Robert Vaughn. With Erica Durance, Robin Dunne, Kyana Teresa, Paulino Nunes. Gwen recently lost her grandmother and she is struggling to run their bakery and regain the Christmas spirit, and figure out her grandmother's magical recipe for the town's legendary Enchanted Christmas Cake." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt15091462/","name":"The Enchanted Christmas Cake","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmQxMzNkMTktZjcxZi00ODdjLTk5Y2YtM2FhZjA2YjE4ZDAyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjIzOTA2NDk@._V1_.jpg","description":"Gwen recently lost her grandmother and she is struggling to run their bakery and regain the Christmas spirit, and figure out her grandmother's magical recipe for the town's legendary Enchanted Christmas Cake.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt15091462/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"MrJackParker"},"dateCreated":"2021-12-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"Worth a watch.","reviewBody":"Robin Dunne and Erica Durance are both Must See TV. Period. They're both excellent so you know the movie is definitely worth a watch based on them alone. And they did carry this flawed, 2 Star Movie up to 6 Stars.

The problem was in the story. It was weak. There was nothing for the audience to really get behind. Nothing of importance. Nothing urgent enough to make the audience really care and root for the characters.

The writers did a very poor job getting the audience to care about the supposedly popular and magical Christmas lebkuchen because it wasn't set up well. All we got was one grumpy, demanding customer wanting it and he was just rude. The cake, wonderful grandma, the bakery being popular and special? We got no sense of that except that we were told in passing, not shown.

Without the urgency of something important to care about, the story just falls flat. Erica Durance did a great job but, as for her character, Gwen? She was a nice lady, I guess. But that's all we get to know about her. The plot, the characters, the setting... it was all shallow and left viewers with nothing to get invested in. The payoff of the supposed "enchanted, magical" lebkuchen recipe? Even that gets taken away from the viewer because of how that was treated by the writers.

Watch the movie simply to enjoy Robin Dunne and Erica Durance. Put two lesser actors in their roles and I would have turned it off.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":194,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.4},"genre":["Romance"],"datePublished":"2021-12-15","keywords":"christmas","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1570568/","name":"Erica Durance"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0242903/","name":"Robin Dunne"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm9143478/","name":"Kyana Teresa"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1034909/","name":"Robert Vaughn"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0012678/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0242903/","name":"Robin Dunne"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0475435/","name":"Linda Kupecek"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1034909/","name":"Robert Vaughn"}],"duration":"PT1H30M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 15091462, Title: The Enchanted Christmas Cake, --- Description: The Enchanted Christmas Cake: Directed by Robert Vaughn. With Erica Durance, Robin Dunne, Kyana Teresa, Paulino Nunes. Gwen recently lost her grandmother and she is struggling to run their bakery and regain the Christmas spirit, and figure out her grandmother's magical recipe for the town's legendary Enchanted Christmas Cake." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt15091462/","name":"The Enchanted Christmas Cake","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmQxMzNkMTktZjcxZi00ODdjLTk5Y2YtM2FhZjA2YjE4ZDAyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjIzOTA2NDk@._V1_.jpg","description":"Gwen recently lost her grandmother and she is struggling to run their bakery and regain the Christmas spirit, and figure out her grandmother's magical recipe for the town's legendary Enchanted Christmas Cake.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt15091462/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"MrJackParker","dateCreated":"2021-12-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"Worth a watch.","reviewBody":"Robin Dunne and Erica Durance are both Must See TV. Period. They're both excellent so you know the movie is definitely worth a watch based on them alone. And they did carry this flawed, 2 Star Movie up to 6 Stars.

The problem was in the story. It was weak. There was nothing for the audience to really get behind. Nothing of importance. Nothing urgent enough to make the audience really care and root for the characters.

The writers did a very poor job getting the audience to care about the supposedly popular and magical Christmas lebkuchen because it wasn't set up well. All we got was one grumpy, demanding customer wanting it and he was just rude. The cake, wonderful grandma, the bakery being popular and special? We got no sense of that except that we were told in passing, not shown.

Without the urgency of something important to care about, the story just falls flat. Erica Durance did a great job but, as for her character, Gwen? She was a nice lady, I guess. But that's all we get to know about her. The plot, the characters, the setting... it was all shallow and left viewers with nothing to get invested in. The payoff of the supposed "enchanted, magical" lebkuchen recipe? Even that gets taken away from the viewer because of how that was treated by the writers.

Watch the movie simply to enjoy Robin Dunne and Erica Durance. Put two lesser actors in their roles and I would have turned it off.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":194,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.4,"genre":["Romance"],"datePublished":"2021-12-15","keywords":"christmas","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1570568/","name":"Erica Durance","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0242903/","name":"Robin Dunne","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm9143478/","name":"Kyana Teresa"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1034909/","name":"Robert Vaughn"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0012678/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0242903/","name":"Robin Dunne","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0475435/","name":"Linda Kupecek","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1034909/","name":"Robert Vaughn"],"duration":"PT1H30M"</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: Fahrenheit 451: Directed by Ramin Bahrani. With Michael B. Jordan, Aaron Davis, Cindy Katz, Michael Shannon. In a terrifying care-free future, a young man, Guy Montag, whose job as a fireman is to burn all books, questions his actions after meeting a young woman - and begins to rebel against society." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0360556/","name":"Fahrenheit 451","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmM1ZGJkZDgtNzBlNS00YjkyLTk3NGEtZTIxMGVkMTk2Yjg1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTMxODk2OTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"In a terrifying care-free future, a young man, Guy Montag, whose job as a fireman is to burn all books, questions his actions after meeting a young woman - and begins to rebel against society.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0360556/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"smoke0"},"dateCreated":"2018-05-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"Watch Equilibrium and the 1966 film instead of this mess","reviewBody":"Subject line says it all, if you want an updated Fahrenheit 451, watch Equilibrium, and for true context, watch the original adaptation from 1966, as both are superior to this silly mess. I won't even go into the reasons why this film is bad, it just is, and other reviews have touched on many points why. Both films I cite above are far more entertaining and insightful, as this film has absolutely nothing to say."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":19403,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.9},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama","Sci-Fi","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2018-05-20","keywords":"dystopia,book burning,flamethrower,emoji,based on novel","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1047967769","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjEwZjI5YzAtMzlmNC00YzVkLTgzOTgtNGM0ZmIyZDU3M2ZjXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjEwZjI5YzAtMzlmNC00YzVkLTgzOTgtNGM0ZmIyZDU3M2ZjXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg","description":"In a terrifying care-free future, a young man, Guy Montag, whose job as a fireman is to burn all books, questions his actions after meeting a young girl...and begins to rebel against society."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0430107/","name":"Michael B. programme.title: Mission: Impossible
Mission: Impossible
programme.desc: Mission: Impossible: Directed by Brian De Palma. With Tom Cruise, Jon Voight, Emmanuelle Béart, Henry Czerny. An American agent, under false suspicion of disloyalty, must discover and expose the real spy without the help of his organization." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0117060/","name":"Mission: Impossible","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc3NjI2MjU0Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDk3ODYxMTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"An American agent, under false suspicion of disloyalty, must discover and expose the real spy without the help of his organization.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0117060/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Rammstein-2"},"dateCreated":"2000-02-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"I like this film!","reviewBody":"I really liked this one. Not very much in common with the TV-series, and I can see why so many dislike it that way. But there are some REALLY good sequences here, and there is even one that I consider to be one of the very best and most suspenseful parts of any movie - the part where Cruise is in the vault. Beautiful and nerve-racking.\n\nNot much else to say, though - it's an action movie, and it's a good one.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":407156,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Thriller"],"datePublished":"1996-05-22","keywords":"train,betrayal,murder,based on tv show,famous score","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Mission: Impossible","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3226468377","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTI2NjUyYjEtNzhiMy00ZGM4LTliNWQtM2ZkYjgwMGVmYjg1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTI2NjUyYjEtNzhiMy00ZGM4LTliNWQtM2ZkYjgwMGVmYjg1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from Paramount"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000129/","name":"Tom Cruise"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000685/","name":"Jon Voight"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000322/","name":"Emmanuelle Béart"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000361/","name":"Brian De Palma"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023400/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0012382/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0312367/","name":"Bruce Geller"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0462895/","name":"David Koepp"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001873/","name":"Steven Zaillian"}],"duration":"PT1H50M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Mission: Impossible II
Mission: Impossible 2
Mission: Impossible II
programme.desc:
Mission: Impossible II: Directed by John Woo. With Tom Cruise, Dougray Scott, Thandiwe Newton, Ving Rhames. IMF agent Ethan Hunt is sent to Sydney to find and destroy a genetically modified disease called "Chimera"." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0120755/","name":"Mission: Impossible II","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2RkYWVkZDQtNTMxMi00NWQ4LWE2ODctNmQzOWM2NjQzYzdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjUzOTY1NTc@._V1_.jpg","description":"IMF agent Ethan Hunt is sent to Sydney to find and destroy a genetically modified disease called "Chimera".","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0120755/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"bob the moo"},"dateCreated":"2002-08-18","inLanguage":"English","name":"Really dumb and lazy film  barely manages to be fun at all","reviewBody":"IMF Agent Ethan Hunt is sent on a seemingly impossible mission to capture a destroy the only existing supply of a deadly disease known as Chimera. However a group of terrorists, led by ex-IMF agent Ambrose also want the disease so that they can us it to infect the world as they have already got the only cure. Hunt turns to jewel thief Nyah to help him by infiltrating her ex-lover's (Ambrose) group to spy on them.

John Woo must have thought of the elements he needed to follow up the solid thrills of the original movie. Big action scenes? Yes. Slow-motion? Yes. Plot? Characters? Good theme music? Logic of any kind? Nope  won't be needing those! Or at least that's how it felt. The plot of the first film was clever despite being open to holes  the plot here makes the first one look like a watertight piece of genius! The story only really serves to set up action scenes and the like  I can barely remember the disease and can only recall rubbish action scenes!

For a director like John Woo I knew to expect slow-mo and OTT action, but I didn't know that it would all be so very superficial and weak. For example the car chase where Hunt and Nyah meet is just ridiculous and very annoying. The robbery of the disease is a pale shadow of the original film's robbery scene and the final motorbike chase is good but only a hint of what Woo has done before. The plot overuses the whole `face mask' thing  it must do it about 8 or 9 times  many of those time's there's no way Hunt could have made a mask of the people involved! It's another example of how silly it is.

While Cruise was cool in the first film, here he is slick and tough  an image that doesn't work. He was much better in the first film. Scott is non-existent as a villain and is pretty dull. Newton is sexy but no more than that. Rhames is good and Hopkins has an enjoyable minor role.

Overall this film is an OTT mess. The plot is a shambles and the action scenes are silly and often have no logical reason behind them! The overuse of the face masks just points to the total lack of a good script and Woo's slow motion just feels tired and unimaginative. Only the final action scene is enjoyable, but by then you're ony interesting in turning this off and watching De Palma's much better film instead."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":328995,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2000-05-24","keywords":"finger cut off,ethan hunt character,luther stickell character,time bomb,slit skirt","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000129/","name":"Tom Cruise"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0779084/","name":"Dougray Scott"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0628601/","name":"Thandiwe Newton"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000247/","name":"John Woo"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023400/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0012382/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0194528/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0312367/","name":"Bruce Geller"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0601822/","name":"Ronald D. Moore"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0103804/","name":"Brannon Braga"}],"duration":"PT2H3M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Mission: Impossible III
Mission: Impossible III
programme.desc: Mission: Impossible III: Directed by J.J. Abrams. With Tom Cruise, Philip Seymour Hoffman, Ving Rhames, Billy Crudup. IMF agent Ethan Hunt comes into conflict with a dangerous and sadistic arms dealer who threatens his life and his fiancée in response." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0317919/","name":"Mission: Impossible III","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOThhNTA1YjItYzk2Ny00M2Y1LWJlYWUtZDQyZDU0YmY5Y2M5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjU0OTQ0OTY@._V1_.jpg","description":"IMF agent Ethan Hunt comes into conflict with a dangerous and sadistic arms dealer who threatens his life and his fiancée in response.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0317919/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"aheen-94576"},"dateCreated":"2020-03-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great in so many aspects","reviewBody":"A very good addition to the series. A great movie after the first one. MI:II is must not be considered an MI movie, but this one here builds the foundation to take the series further. We get an insight of Hunt's life. The driving force of the MI series is Hunt's dilemmas. The movie begins to get into the MI universe with showing us what Hunt is made of and why he chooses what he chooses in the next films. The actions were a plus point, very few overuse of action is encountered. The action were basic nevertheless. But still the movie gives away many of Hunt's super spy skills like lip reading and webslinging across building. Got to say, Hunt is very lucky to survive so many life and death situation.\n\nThe acting was on point, the other characters other than Hunt hadn't have any significant challenges in acting considering the calibre of them. Tom Cruise grew as an actor and it showed if his performance from first two filmshas to be considered. I wish the movie was less predictable and avoided the cliches. It's a good movie to pass your time.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":344222,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2006-05-17","keywords":"ethan hunt character,luther stickell character,tape over mouth,tough woman,italy","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Mission: Impossible III","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1587151129","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzBlNGVmZjQtNjMwOC00N2ZiLTllNWUtMWY0MzRlNWVlMjI5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzBlNGVmZjQtNjMwOC00N2ZiLTllNWUtMWY0MzRlNWVlMjI5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from Paramount"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000129/","name":"Tom Cruise"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1157358/","name":"Michelle Monaghan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000609/","name":"Ving Rhames"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0009190/","name":"J.J. programme.title: Monster Hunter
Monster Hunter
programme.desc:
Monster Hunter: Directed by Paul W.S. Anderson. With Milla Jovovich, Tony Jaa, Ron Perlman, T.I.. When Cpt. Artemis and her loyal soldiers are transported to a new world, they engage in a desperate battle for survival against enormous enemies with incredible powers. Feature film based on the video game by Capcom." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6475714/","name":"Monster Hunter","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOGU3NTFmNjYtODc3Ny00MWEzLWI3M2ItZjE3NDgwMTI0MzkzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTEyMjM2NDc2._V1_.jpg","description":"When Cpt. Artemis and her loyal soldiers are transported to a new world, they engage in a desperate battle for survival against enormous enemies with incredible powers. Feature film based on the video game by Capcom.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6475714/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Impartial-Reviewer"},"dateCreated":"2021-02-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"A B Level Film With A Blockbuster Graphics Level.","reviewBody":"A film based on the game franchise "Monster Hunter", where it tells a story of Lt. Artemis who finds herself along with her soldiers teleported to another world full of Mega sized monsters and her attempt to return to our world.

As simple and silly as it may sound, that's pretty much the story here. An equation that almost everyone in Western cinema world and mainly Hollywood fails to understand...when a Game or a Film is created in a certain country in the world and it's a major success, it "Never" means that it'll receive the same success once it gets disfigured by the western touch! Not like ever...I can easily rename the disastrous experiences which clearly no one learns from them. From Resident Evil to Godzilla...etc or even the Ugliness of Hollywood Horror remakes like in the Grudge, Quarantine or The Ring...etc. Each country of cultures adds its own flavor to their films! Even if you insist on remaking a film, stick to the authenticity, Stop shoving fking Americans blindly in every remake and Don't change neither genders nor races in which only ruins the adaptation integrity.

Monster Hunter is a vivid example of such. The film started good, there's absolutely No need for Lt. bs and her pointless platoon! The film could have been authentic and true to the heart of the game if it focused and continued the path of the first few minutes. The film can averagely only be enjoyed by the Monster Hunter Games fans, to me the first 4 mins was Good then followed by bad plot, limited acting skills, lazy script, mindless action and a wide open ending in hope for a second part.

The only good element in this is just the CGI other than that the directing and makeup was a joke...least to say The Admiral looks like an old drag queen, Lt. Feature film based on the video game by Capcom." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6475714/","name":"Monster Hunter","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOGU3NTFmNjYtODc3Ny00MWEzLWI3M2ItZjE3NDgwMTI0MzkzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTEyMjM2NDc2._V1_.jpg","description":"When Cpt. Feature film based on the video game by Capcom.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6475714/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Impartial-Reviewer","dateCreated":"2021-02-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"A B Level Film With A Blockbuster Graphics Level.","reviewBody":"A film based on the game franchise "Monster Hunter", where it tells a story of Lt. Artemis who finds herself along with her soldiers teleported to another world full of Mega sized monsters and her attempt to return to our world.

As simple and silly as it may sound, that's pretty much the story here. An equation that almost everyone in Western cinema world and mainly Hollywood fails to understand...when a Game or a Film is created in a certain country in the world and it's a major success, it "Never" means that it'll receive the same success once it gets disfigured by the western touch! Not like ever...I can easily rename the disastrous experiences which clearly no one learns from them. From Resident Evil to Godzilla...etc or even the Ugliness of Hollywood Horror remakes like in the Grudge, Quarantine or The Ring...etc. Each country of cultures adds its own flavor to their films! Even if you insist on remaking a film, stick to the authenticity, Stop shoving fking Americans blindly in every remake and Don't change neither genders nor races in which only ruins the adaptation integrity.

Monster Hunter is a vivid example of such. The film started good, there's absolutely No need for Lt. bs and her pointless platoon! The film could have been authentic and true to the heart of the game if it focused and continued the path of the first few minutes. The film can averagely only be enjoyed by the Monster Hunter Games fans, to me the first 4 mins was Good then followed by bad plot, limited acting skills, lazy script, mindless action and a wide open ending in hope for a second part.

The only good element in this is just the CGI other than that the directing and makeup was a joke...least to say The Admiral looks like an old drag queen, Lt. Artemis and her soldier driver "Dash" never loss their makeup or hair style regardless of the storms, fights with Diablos...etc, Not to mention Dash's fake eyelashes and she's a soldier in battle ffs.

Monster Hunter is a sad and silly mindless fun to kill time without any authenticity to the games which completely lacks the deserved respect to the elements of intelligence of the games fans base.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":50680,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.3,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2020-12-04","keywords":"based on video game,parallel world,female soldier,written by director,military","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"International Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi638763289","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmEyM2JkN2ItNmQ3NS00ZTkzLWEwMjYtZmU1YmJlODczZWM1XkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmEyM2JkN2ItNmQ3NS00ZTkzLWEwMjYtZmU1YmJlODczZWM1XkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg","description":"Behind our world, there is another: a world of dangerous and powerful monsters that rule their domain with deadly ferocity. programme.title: Phone Booth
Telefon
Phone Booth
programme.desc: Phone Booth: Directed by Joel Schumacher. With Colin Farrell, Kiefer Sutherland, Forest Whitaker, Radha Mitchell. Publicist Stuart Shepard finds himself trapped in a phone booth, pinned down by an extortionist's sniper rifle. Unable to leave or receive outside help, Stuart's negotiation with the caller leads to a jaw-dropping climax." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0183649/","name":"Phone Booth","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTcxNDQ5MzAyOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwMjkxMTU3._V1_.jpg","description":"Publicist Stuart Shepard finds himself trapped in a phone booth, pinned down by an extortionist's sniper rifle. Unable to leave or receive outside help, Stuart's negotiation with the caller leads to a jaw-dropping climax.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0183649/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Jason_Lee"},"dateCreated":"2003-04-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"Synopsis of this flick without spoiling the end.","reviewBody":"Have you ever seen a movie that you would actually pay money to watch more than once? What if I told you that this film had a setting of only one main location, two main actors and three supporting cast members? While these elements don't make up what a classic movie sounds like on paper, add director Joel Schumacher (Bad Company, 8mm) into the mix, along with screenwriter Larry Cohen, who had this story handed down to him by Alfred Hitchcock himself about 30 years ago, and you have the perfect blend of blackmail, violence and extortion: Phone Booth. The story begins by showing a glimpse into the life of Stu Shepard (Daredevil's Colin Farrell). Stu is a New York hustler that people love to hate. He is egotistical, two-faced to everyone he knows and does what he can for personal gratification. He even fantasizes about cheating on his wife Kelly (Pitch Black's Radha Mitchell) and the object of that desire is Pamela McFadden (Dawson Creek's Katie Holmes). Pam is a young actress trying to get her first break, while Stu has been grooming her for the big time. To avoid having his calls to Pam appear on his cellular phone bill, Stu calls her from the lone phone booth left in the heart of NYC. However, things would be different on this day. Upon hanging up, he receives a call that would turn his whole world upside down. The caller (24's Kiefer Sutherland) is a sniper, who has been targeting high-profile underhanded suits, just like Stu. He has a few simple rules so that Stu does not meet the same fate that two others had before him: don't leave the booth, don't tell anyone who he's talking to, and most importantly, don't hang up. To prove his seriousness, the caller shoots and kills a pimp who tries to physically remove Stu from the booth for taking too much time with his call. This, as expected, does not help matters, and the fallen pimp's hookers now believe it was indeed Stu who committed the murder. Soon, the NYPD and numerous media outlets are covering this serious situation. Things become increasingly difficult for Stu Shepard as Kelly and Pam both show up. In the meantime, the caller continues to play various mind games, while the sympathetic NYPD Captain Ramey (Twilight Zone's Forest Whitaker) tries to solve the issue. During all of this, Stu tries to maintain his sanity and not risk any more lives. His lies no longer matter. As a result, he must now search his soul, discover himself and attempt to outsmart the caller, taking the game to a whole new level. The cinematography is outstanding. Schumacher uses the right angle for every shot, and manages to keep everyone's attention with quick pans and abrupt cuts. In the end, the 80-minute movie seems longer but not because it is boring. The biggest payoff comes with the twist ending that changes the film's outcome within sixty seconds. There was not one bad performance in Phone Booth. Farrell's ability to convert his Irish brogue to a Brooklyn drawl makes his performance as Bullseye in Daredevil look like a child's school play when compared to the Broadway-level of acting he manages here. While Mitchell and Holmes did not have lengthy parts, their roles added just enough to the story and they managed to perform up to the standards of their characters. Forest Whitaker was a surprisingly great addition to the cast and his role as a sympathetic cop is one that's not often seen, and should thus be welcomed. However, all of these actors are outshined by Kiefer Sutherland, who ends up being extremely creepy and one of the best antagonists in recent movie history by just using his voice. Will this win Best Picture at next year's Academy Awards? It probably won't. However, with a great story, top-notch directing and a cast with great chemistry, what more could you ask for? Out of a possible five stars, I give this the limit of five with desires to go even higher. While I would go see it again and again, not everyone has the same tastes. However, I would put down the $8 for a ticket to see the flick at least once. If nothing else, it will make you stop and think: the next time you enter a phone booth, just who will be watching?"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":260971,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2003-06-11","keywords":"single set production,psychopath,phone booth,sniper,hostage","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Phone Booth","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi932970777","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzJkN2QxODUtN2Q2OS00OGE1LTk2ZjgtM2ExYjcyMTJlMDg5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzJkN2QxODUtN2Q2OS00OGE1LTk2ZjgtM2ExYjcyMTJlMDg5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0268199/","name":"Colin Farrell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000662/","name":"Kiefer Sutherland"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001845/","name":"Forest Whitaker"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001708/","name":"Joel Schumacher"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017497/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0150494/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0169540/","name":"Larry Cohen"}],"duration":"PT1H21M"}</script><metacontent="
